Baai ale jam bo ba po la ale Mɛɛri Magdala ale Mɛɛri, Jeemsi ale Josefi mawa, ale Zebedi powa.
Jigsiro wanyi ale jam nyini tɛŋ ate ba a wi ayen, Arimatia. Wa yoi a jam ale Josefi. Wa jam ka waai ale ta siaka ale Yeezu.

Da dila danni junɔai ate wa yaa cheŋ Paalɔt jigi a saalim wa ayen wa basi ate wa ga yeeri Yeezu nyiŋka jabarimu zuk a ta cheŋ ga gu. Paalɔt a yaa siak ayen wa ga yeeri Yeezu nyiŋka jabarimu zuk a ta ga gu.
Josefi a yaa basi dula jigini alege cheŋ ga yeeri Yeezu nyiŋka jabarimu zuk a yaa pa garuk paaluk a pili ka
a ta ga dueni puŋ vorub paalik po. (Tɛŋ kala demma a jam a gu ba nuruma ka pina vie po). Wa yaa bilim tintain kpeeni a lik puŋku vorumu nɔanni.
Mɛɛri Magdala ale Mɛɛri nwala a jam kali ka dula a tuk vorumu nyiŋ.
Vari ale ŋman Veenti la, ba Vuusum Danni saliuku Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa ale Farisiima a yaa cheŋ Paalɔt jigi a weeni wa ayen,
“Ti deema teeri velinvendika ale jam boro la wa weeni ayen, ‘M le yiti kum po ku daa ŋata dai.’
Be basi ate ba ga a limsi vorumu ate ku paari daa ŋata ate wa ŋaaŋviirima a kan magi yeeri wa abe ba weeni nuruma ayen wa yiti kum po. Dan kan daa di ventaŋa de ale gaam wa le liŋ velim dii la.”
Paalɔt a yaa siak ale basi ayen sojiba cheŋ a ga ŋmasi a limsi vorumu.
Ba yaa cheŋ ga daani tintanni ayen waai dan bilim di abe ba miŋ a yaa le basi ate sojima a limsi vorumu.
Ba Vuusum Danni ale taam la, Mɛɛri Magdala ale Mɛɛri nwala a yaa cheŋ ba nya juijui ate ba gu Yeezu la.
Tɛŋka yaa jam choa nna yegayega, ate sabiilo a nyini wenŋmazuk a siŋ bilim tintanni a dueni nakpiak a kali di zuk.
Sabiilowa a jam kasim a nyagsi kama ase wein ale a chagsi dii la. Wa gattaŋa me a peenti nna yegayega.
Yɔgsum yaa yik baai ale a limsi vorumu la nna yegayega ate ba nyiŋsaŋa a gok ate ba nyɛ nna ase ba kpi la.
Sabiilowa a yaa weeni nipooma ayen, “Ni kan chali yɔgsumɔa, mi seba ayen ni a gisi ka Yeezu waai ate ba kpi wa jabarimu nyiŋ la.
Wa ka dela jigini, wa yiti kum po kama ase wa ale liŋ weeni ni dii la. Ni jam a nya juijui ate ba pa wa a dueni la.
Ni cheŋ nwuli a ga weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen wa yiti kum po kama, wa be de ka niŋ a cheŋ Galili tɛŋka. Ni le nya wa dula jigini. Ni teeri m le weeni ni dii la.”
Ba yaa basi dula jigini ale supeentik a ga weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima dii meena ate sabiilowa a weeni ba la.
Yeezu a yaa tu ba dula jigini a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Suyɔgini a bo ale ni.” Ba yaa domsi kali a puusi wa.
Yeezu yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni kan chali yɔgsumɔa abe ni ga weeni m suaataŋa ayen ba cheŋ Galili tɛŋka a ga tu mu dula jigini.”
Nipooma ale cheŋ a ga nueri la, sojima gela a yaa cheŋ tɛŋka po a ga weeni Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa dii meena ale nyɛ la.
Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa a yaa tu chaab ale tɛŋka kpaŋŋa ate ba pa ligra yegayega a te sojima ale weeni ba ayen,
“Ni weeni ayen nama a doa goa kama ate wa ŋaaŋviirima a jam zu pa wa.
Gominawa a dan poom wom ti le biisi a vari ni a basi.”
Sojima yaa tuesi ligraŋa ale weeni ate ku paari Juuma meena ayen Yeezu ŋaaŋviirima ale zu pa wa vorumu po.
Wa ŋaaŋviirima pi ale wanyiwa a yaa cheŋ a ga jueli guuk kunyi zuk Galili tɛŋka po juijui ate Yeezu a weeni ba ayen ba cheŋ la.
Ba ale nya wa dula jigini la ba yaa puusi wa. Ba gela a jam diem ta ka chichama.
Yeezu a yaa forisi paari ba a weeni ba ayen, “Naawen a te mi pagrim kama wenŋmazuk ale tɛŋzuk meena.
Ni cheŋ tɛŋsa meena a sak nuruba ate ba va mi, abe ni a te ba soka Kowa Naawen ale wa biika ale wa chiika pagrim nyiŋ.
Ni sak ba ate ba va wie ŋaai meena ate mi a sak ni la. M le bo ale ni a ga paari tɛŋka kpeglimka.”
Dila po dila po Naawen jam weeni wa biisiteerɔma wanyi ate ba a wi ayen Azaya la, ayen wa ŋmarisi nyo Naawen gbaŋka po ayen,
“ ‘Wa le tom nuru ate wa de niŋ jam gomsi siuku a magsi a te waai ale wa jam la.’
Lueluk ale a kaari goanni po a weeni ayen,
‘ni gomsi Nyɔnɔwa siuku abe ni teenti ku.’ ”
Naawen biika ate ba a wi ayen Yeezu Kirisita la wamaŋsaŋa wie ale nna. Ku be piilim kama a magsi chaab ale Azaya ale ŋmarisi dii Naawen gbaŋka po la.

Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate nuru wanyi ate ba a wi ayen Jɔɔn a yaa nyini goanni po a jam a sak nuruba Naawen wie ale a te ba soka ale a weeni ba ayen, “Ni meena basi ni wabaataŋa, abe ni va Naawen siuku. Ni dan tagri m le te ni soka ate Naawen a voŋ ni wabaataŋa a te ni.”

Nuruba yegayega a yaa nyini tɛŋkpieŋka Jerusalem ale tɛŋ sii meena ale gilim ka a bo Judia po la a jam Jɔɔn jigi. Ba ale wom wa sinsaŋŋa la, ba yaa tɔk ba tuimbaataŋa meena a sak Naawen ale ge ate Jɔɔn yaa te ba soka beli dii ate ba a wi ayen Jodan la po.
Ba jam pa ka laalaakomi kobta a nyɛ Jɔɔn garuku. Wa jam pa ka chiakgbain a bobi wa chiaka. Wa jam a ŋobi ka tintue ale a de siita me.
Wa jam a mooli kama ayen, “Nuru wanyi ale bo mi ŋaaŋ a cheena. Wa ta pagrim a gaam mi kama. Mi posima ale m nin chim yomo waai ale wa domsi a kali wa niŋ a yeeri wa nuensaŋa a te wa.
Nyiam ate mi pa a so ni nyiŋsaŋa, alege waai ale cheena la, a le pa ka Naawen Chiika a sueri ni suniimaŋa.”
Da ŋala po Yeezu a jam nyini tɛŋ kanyi ate ba a wi ayen Nazaret ate ka jam bo tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Galili la po. Wa yaa jam Jɔɔn jigi ayen Jɔɔn te wa soka Jodan benni po.
Jɔɔn ale te wa soka a nueri ate Yeezu a yaa nyini nyiamu sunsuŋ a jueli la, wa yaa deri nya wenŋmazuku ale ku lagri ate wa nya Naawen Chiika a siŋ jam kali wa zuk nna ase nangbaŋ la,
ate lueluk a yaa nyini wenŋmazuku po a weeni Yeezu ayen, “Fi ale m be kaai ate m mariŋ la. M sui a peenti ale fu kama.”
Dula jigini Naawen Chiika a yaa basi ate Yeezu a cheŋ ga jo goanni po juijui ate goaduŋsa a boro la.

Wa jam bo dula jigini ate ku paari ka da pisinaansi. Da ŋala po Sitaana a yaa jam wa jigi a nyɛ wa nya ayen wa siak a te wa, alege Sitaana an jam baga a paasi wa. Naawen yaa tom sabiiloba ayen ba jam maa maari wa.
Da yeŋ po nuruba a yaa yik Jɔɔn a ta wa ga lik dɔk po. Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate Yeezu a yaa jam Galili tɛŋka po a mooli Naawen wamaŋsaŋa ayen,
“Da ŋaai ate Naawen dak ayen wa naamu le jam la, a mɔata kama. Ni basi ni tuimbaataŋa abe ni ta siaka ale wa wamaŋsaŋa.”
Yeezu ale va Galili mogi kpeeni noai a taam la, wa yaa nya nuru wanyi ale wa suok. Ba yue ale Simon ale Andiru, ate ba yaa za a yuk ba ŋmaasaŋa a basi nyiamu po.
Yeezu yaa wi ba ayen, “Ni jam va mi ŋaaŋ. Nama daam ka jum yigrisa, alege jinla mi a te ni ka tuim paali ayen ni nyɛ ate nuruba a jam va mu.”
Ba yaa ale wom dila la, ba yaa deri basi ba ŋmaasaŋa ale va wa.

Wa ale ga cheŋ maga la, wa yaa ŋman nya nuruba baye ate ba a wi ba ayen Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn. Ba jam ka nuru waai ate ba a wi ayen Zebedi la, bisa. Ba ale ba kowa ale wa tomteerɔma ale jam kala ba ŋaaruŋku po a gomsi ba ŋmaasaŋa.
Yeezu a yaa wi ba, ate ba yaa basi ba kowa ale wa tomteerɔma ŋaaruŋku po ale cheŋ ga va wa.
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima yaa cheŋ ga jo tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Kapernaum la po. Juuma Vuusum Danni ale jam paari la, Yeezu yaa cheŋ ga jo ba tuka dɔkku po a boro a sak ba Naawen wie.
Nuruma ale wom wa sinsaŋŋa la, ku yaa cha ba, dii nyiŋ la wa sinsaŋŋa a kan neensi Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma. Wa sakka a ta pagrim a gaam ba sinsaŋŋa kama.
Dula jigini nuru ale jam ta chichiribiok ate ku bo wa zukku po. Wa yaa jam jo ba tuka dɔkku po a kaari ayen,
“Yeezu Nazaret denowa, fi a yaali ka boa ti jigiya? Fi jam ayen fi kaasi ti kama? M seba ayen fi ka Naawen nuru weleŋ.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni chichiribioku ayen, “Goori abe fi nyini wa zukku po a nyini.”
Chichiribioku a deri basi ate nuruwa nyiŋka a gok a yaa kaari a nyini wa jigi a nyini.

Ku yaa cha nuruma meena ale jam bo dula la, ate ba weeni ayen, “Ni nya nuruwa de ta pagrim a weeni chichiribaata ate ti a wom wa noai a nyini nuruba zuima po a nyini.” Ba ya bek chaab me ayen, “Ka boan jaab sinsak paala ale nna?”
Galili tɛŋka po nuruma yegayega a jam wom Yeezu ale tom dii la kama.
Yeezu a yaa basi tuka dɔkku ale ge cheŋ. Wa ale Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn a yaa cheŋ ga jo Simon ale Andiru yenni po.
Yeezu ale jo yenni po la, ba yaa weeni wa ayen ka Simon ŋanuba ale a yuak. Wa nyiŋka jam toliŋ ka nna yegayega ate wa jam dua wa dɔkku po.
Yeezu a yaa jo nipowa dɔkku po a yik wa nisaŋa a zak ate wa yiri ŋmai. Wa ale nyɛ dila la, wa nyiŋka a yaa deri yok ate wa yiri yaali nyiam a te ba.
Wein ale siŋ la, tɛŋka po demma a pa ba yɔgnyeensa ale baai ate chichiribaata a jam bo ba zuima po la a ta ba jam Yeezu jigi.
Tɛŋka po demma meena a yaa tigsi chaab a jam yeri dii po ate Yeezu a boro la.

Wa tebi nuruba yegayega baai ate nyiŋtuila tɔgatɔga a jam ta ba la, ale a yiak chichiribaata yegayega nuruba zuima po a basi. Yeezu an jam te chichiribaataŋa siuk ate ti weeni wariya, dii nyiŋ la ti poom seba wa ale ka waai la kama.
Saliuk yokyok ate vanni an diem a jam veenti la, Yeezu a yaa yiri a nyini tɛŋka po a cheŋ juijui ate nuru a karo la a puusi a te Naawen dula jigini.
Vanni ale veenti la, Simon ale wa vaanchaama yaa yiri a nya ale Yeezu a karo. Ba yaa nyini ayen ba gisi wa.
Ba ale nya wa la, ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Nuru meena a nyeemu a gisi fu kama.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni te ti cheŋ tɛŋ sii ale tali la ate m sak dula nuruma Naawen wie ate ba wom. Ka dila nyiŋ ate m jam.”
Wa yaa nyiem a gilim Galili tɛŋka a sak nuruba Naawen wieŋa ba tuka diinaŋa po. Wa jam yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po a basi me.
Gami dinyi a yaa jam Yeezu jigi a kpi duna tɛŋ wa niŋ a saalim wa ayen, “Fi dan siak, fi baga a tebi mu kama, ate mi a nya nyiŋyɔgsa.”
Yeezu a yaa ta jiirim ale wa nna yegayega a yaa teeri wa nisaŋa a tiri wa ale weeni wa ayen, “M siaya. Ta nyiŋyɔgsa.”
Wa ale weeni dila la, nyiŋtuilaŋa yaa deri basi gamini ate wa nya nyiŋyɔgsa.

Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ale nin muna ayen, “Kan weeni sak nuru waaiya fi le nyɛ dii a nya nyiŋyɔgsa la. Cheŋ Naawen Puusika Yenni tomteerɔma wanyi jigi a pa fi dek a sak wa, abe fi nyɛ kaabi kaai ale magsi ase Moosis ale sak ti dii dila po dila po la. Dila le sak nuruba ayen fi yaa ta nyiŋyɔgsa kama.”

Gamini yaa basi dula jigini. Wa an jam va Yeezu ale weeni wa dii la, alege wa jam goanti a nyeemu a weeni wa a meena kama Yeezu ale tebi wa dii la. Dila nyiŋ ate Yeezu an ŋman baga a nyini peelim a jam tɛŋka po wa yaaka. Wa yaa ga bo goanni po ate nuruba nyini tɛŋsa yegayega po a jam wa jigi.
Daa ale ŋman jam taam la, Yeezu a yaa basi dula ale ŋman cheŋ Kapernaum tɛŋka po a ga jo yeri dinyi po. Tɛŋka po demma a yaa wom ayen wa jam ya.

Nuruba yegayega yaa jam tigsi chaab yeri dii po ate wa boro la. Yenni meena a jam sueri kama ate nansiuŋku noai a ka zaanika jigiya, ate Yeezu a yaa boro a sak ba Naawen wie. Nuru wanyi ale jam boro ate wa nisima ale wa naŋsa a jam kpi.
Wa yaa ale boro a sak nuruma la, nuruba banaansi a yaa pa nuru waai ate wa nisaŋa ale wa naŋsaŋa a kpi la, a dueni jaab zuk a ta wa a jam Yeezu jigi.

Ba an jam baga a vuri nuruma po a paari Yeezu, dii nyiŋ la nuruma a jam piisi kama. Ba jam pa nuruwa kama a ta jueli yenni zuk a vuri vorub yenni sunsuŋ a yaa pa miisa a bobi jaamu a pa wa ta va vorumu po a siŋ dueni Yeezu niŋ.
Yeezu ale jam seba ayen ba ta siaka yegayega ale wa la, wa yaa weeni nuru waai ate wa nisaŋa ale wa naŋsaŋa a kpi la ayen, “M biiga, m voŋ fi wabaataŋa a te fu kama.”
Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ba gela ale jam maa kala dula jigini la, a yaa poli ba zuima po ayen,
“Nuruwa de ale a biisi dii la, ku nala? Wa ale a nyɛ dii la ku ka leeta Naawen jigi. Ka Naawen dek wa nyiini ale a voŋ wabaata a te.”
Yeezu a poom seba wa dek popola po ba ale a poli dii la kama. Wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boan jaab popola ate nama a poli ni zuima po?

Mi nin weeni nuruwa de ate wa nisimaŋa ale wa naŋsaŋa a kpi la, ayen Naawen voŋ wa wabaataŋa a te wa a yaase wa yiri a cheŋ, ka kuna dek ale pagra?” Wa ale ga bek dila la, wa yaa cheemu a weeni nuru waai ale a yuak la ayen, “Yiri a zaani ŋmai, abe fi pai fi jaamu ate fi a goa wa zuk la a cheŋ kuli fi yenni.” Yeezu a nyɛ nna kama ate ku sak ayen ni seba ayen ka wa Saalobiika ale ta pagrim tɛŋzuk meena a baga a voŋ nuruba wabaata a te ba.

Nuruwa a yaa deri yiri a zaani ŋmai ale pa wa jaamu a cheŋ nyini. Ku yaa cha nuru baai meena ale jam za dula jigini la. Ba yaa pak Naawen a weeni ayen, “Tama an diem a nya nyaku de choa ase ka jinla nyiini.”
Yeezu yaa basi dula jigini ale ŋman pilim cheŋ Galili mogi kpeeni noai, ate nuru bɔari a yaa jam wa jigi ate wa boro a sak ba Naawen wie.

Wa ale sak ba a nueri la, wa yaa cheŋ ga zik nuru waai ate ba a wi ayen Livai, la. Wa jam ka nuru waai ate ba a wi wa ayen Alfiyus la biik. Wa jam kala ka lampoo cheesika dɔk po a tuesi lampoo. Yeezu yaa weeni wa ayen, “Yiri a jam va mi ŋaaŋ.” Wa yaa basi wa tuimaŋa ale yiri a ga va wa.

Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa cheŋ Livai yenni ayen ba de ŋandiinta. Lampoo cheesiroba ale wabaata nyam yegayega a jam maa va Yeezu ŋaaŋ ate ba gela me a yaa jam gum wa ale wa ŋaaŋviirima po, ate ba meena a kala a de ŋandiinta.

Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma baai ate ba a wi ayen Farisiiba la, ba gela a yaa nya ba ale ba a de ŋandiintaŋa. Ba yaa bek wa ŋaaŋviirima po wanyi ayen, “Ka boa ale a sak ate Yeezu a siak a te lampoo cheesiroba ale wabaata nyam a kali a le wa a de ŋandiinta?”

Yeezu ale wom dila la, wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Fi dan kan a yuagi fi kan cheŋ waai ale a tebi nuruba la jigiya, alege ka yuariba nyiini. Mi an jam ayen m wi ka nuru baai ale a poli ayen ba ka nuru maŋsa la, alege ka wabaata nyam ate m jam ayen m wi.”

Da yeŋ po Jɔɔn waai ale a te nuruba soka la ŋaaŋviirima ale Farisiima ŋaaŋviirima a yaa bobi noa. Nuruba ba gela a yaa jam Yeezu jigi a bek wa ayen, “Ka boa ate Jɔɔn ŋaaŋviirima ale Farisiima ŋaaŋviirima a bobi noa, alege fi ŋaaŋviirima a kan bobi?”

Yeezu a yaa magsi wamagsini bek ba ayen, “Nipɔkfiaka nyɔnɔwa dɔama a baga a bobi noa? Aaya. Nipɔkfiaka nyɔnɔwa ale diem boro ale ba la, ba an baga a nyɛ dila. Mi ale m ŋaaŋviirima abe ale ka dii la ale la.
Alege ku cheena ate nuruba le yik wa a ta cheŋ, dila po wa ba yaa le bobi noa.”
Wa yaa ŋman magsi wamagsini di choa ayen, “Ba kan pa garuchiak paalik a laŋ garuk kpaga. Ba dan nyɛ dila, garuku le cheeri a gum du, a yaase,

ba kan pa da paalik a su bunlɔk kpak po. Ba dan nyɛ dila, bunlɔkku a na kama ate daamu a waaŋi. Ku dan nyɛ dila, nuruwa a jok wa bunlɔkku ale wa daamu meena kama. Da paalik a magsi ka bunlɔk paaluk suka.”
Juuma Vuusum Daaŋa po dinyi ate Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa va nuru wanyi talim po a taam. Ba ale a cheŋ la, wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa wie “wiiti” zuima a ŋobi.
Farisiima ba gela ale jam nya dila la, ba yaa bek Yeezu ayen, “Nya, ka boa ate fi ŋaaŋviirima a kaasi tama Vuusum Danni kisiku?”

Yeezu yaa bek ba ayen, “Nama an diem karim Naawen gbaŋka po a miŋ na waai ate ba a wi ayen Deevid la wie? Da ŋaai po ate nuru waai ate ba a wi ayen Abiata a jam chim Naawen Puusika Yenni kpagi kpeeni la, ate kom a yaa jam ta Deevid ale wa dɔama.

Wa yaa ga jo Naawen Puusika Yenni po a pa boroboruk kuui ate nuruba a ta jam te Naawen la a we ŋobi ale ge a we a te wa dɔama ate ba me a ŋobi. Tama Sinsaŋŋa a weeni kama ayen nuru yoŋ an maara a ŋobi boroboruku de ka Naawen Puusika Yenni tomteerɔma nyiini.
“Naawen an lueri Vuusum Danni ayen ka di soa nuruba, wa nyɛ ka nuruba ale ge lueri Vuusum Danni ayen di chim da maŋ a te ba.
Dila nyiŋ la, mi Saalobiika ale soa Vuusum Daaŋa me.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman cheŋ ga jo ba tuka dɔkku po. Nuru wanyi ale jam bo dula ate wa nisa kpi.
Baai ale jam bo dula la, a yaa limsi ayen ba nya ase Yeezu le tebi yaase wa kan tebi nuruwa nisaŋa Vuusum Danni ate ba baga a weeni wa ayen wa kaasi.
Yeezu a yaa weeni nuru waai ate wa nisaŋa a kpi la ayen, “Yiri ŋmai a jam de.”
A yaa ale ge a weeni nuruma ayen, “Nama seba Juuma Sinsaŋŋa kama. Ku magsi ayen ni tom ka tuimmaŋsa yaa tuimbaata ni Vuusum Danni? Ni te nuruba nyuvuri yaa ni ko ba?”
Ba yaa goori nna chorototo.

Yeezu sui yaa puuri ale ba ate wa gisi nya ba ale su kaasuŋ dii nyiŋ la, ba tueŋa a kpari kama ate ba ka siaka ale wa. Wa yaa weeni nuruwa ayen wa teeri wa nisaŋa. Wa ale teeri si la, si yaa deri nya nyiŋyɔgsa.
Farisiima a yaa yiri a nyini peelim. Ba ale na waai ate ba a wi ayen Ayerod la nuruma a yaa tigsi chaab a poli siuk kuui ba le ba va a ko Yeezu la.
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa nyini dula jigini a ŋman cheŋ mogi kpeeni noai. Nuruba yegayega a nyini Galili tɛŋka po a cheŋ va wa ŋaaŋ.

Ba gela a nyini Jerusalem ale Judia tɛŋsaŋa po. Ba gela me a nyini tɛŋka choa ate ba a wi ayen Idumia ale tɛŋ sii meena ale bo Jodan beli kpeeni ŋaaŋ nyiŋ la. Ba gela me a ŋman nyini tɛŋsa ate ba a wi ayen Taaya ale Saidon ale tɛŋ sii meena ale gilim dula jigini la.

Yeezu yaa weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen ba gisi ŋaaruŋ a gomsi ku a zaani wa, dii nyiŋ la nuruma a piisi ka nna yegayega a yaa a tusi wa. Nuruma de meena ale wom Yeezu ale a nyɛ dii la ale soa ate ba jam wa jigi.
Yeezu a tebi nuruba yegayega dula jigini. Ka dila ale soa ate ba a tusi chaab ayen ba paari a tiri wa nya la.
Baai ate chichiribaata a bo ba zuima po la ale nya wa la, ba yaa lo tɛŋ a kaari yegayega a weeni wa ayen, “Fi ka Naawen biik.”
Nna nyiem a dan nyɛ, Yeezu a nyiem a weeni chichiribaataŋa ka bunyi dekki ayen ti goori abe ti kan weeni sak nuruba wa ale ka waai la.

Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa cheŋ ga jueli guuk kunyi zuk. Wa ale jueli a nueri la, wa yaa wi nuru baai ate wa a yaali ayen ba jam wa jigi la. Wa yaa lueri nuruba pi ale baye a ta nyini nuru baai meena ate wa wi la po ayen ba jam va wa. Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “M lueri ni kama ayen ni kasim bo ale mu. M le tom ni me ate ni nyini peelim a mooli Naawen wieŋa ate nuruba wom. M be le te ni pagrim ate ni baga a yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po a basi.”
Wa nuruma pi ale bayewa yue ale Simon waai ate Yeezu a te wa yue paali ayen Piita la,
ale Jeemsi ale wa suoku Jɔɔn. Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn a jam ka nuru waai ate ba a wi ayen Zebedi la bisa. Yeezu yaa ŋman te ba yue paali ayen Boanejisi. Di kiri ale nanpansa nuruba.

Yeezu a yaa ŋman lueri Andiru ale Filip ale Batolomiu ale Matiu ale Tomasi ale Jeemsi waai ale jam ka nuru waai ate ba a wi ayen Alfiyus la, biik. Wa ŋman lueri Tadiusi ale Simon waai ale jam a nyɛ ayen Juuma a nya ba dek zuk la.
Wa yaa ŋman lueri Judas Iskariot, nuru waai ale wa ta Yeezu a ga bobri a sak la. Wa yaa ale lueri ba a nueri la, ba meena a yaa va chaab a nyini guuku zuk a siŋ a cheŋ ga jo yeri dinyi po.
Nuru bɔari yegayega a yaa ŋman tigsi chaab a jam Yeezu jigi, ate wa ŋaaŋviirima an jam baga a nya siuk a de ŋandiinta.
Yeezu dɔkku demma ale wom dila la, ba yaa nyini ayen ba gisi a yik wa, dii nyiŋ la nuruba ale jam a weeni ayen, “Wa zukku a tagri kama.”

Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ba gela a yaa nyini Jerusalem tɛŋka po a jam weeni chaab ayen, “Chichiribaataŋa meena naawa ate ba a wi ayen Beelzebu la, ale bo wa nyiŋka po a kasim a te wa pagrim ate wa baga a yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po a basi.”
Yeezu a yaa wi Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ate ba jam wa tɛŋ ate wa yaa magsi wamagsima a sak ba ale bek ba ayen, “Sitaana a nyɛ ka se a baga yiak wa dek tomteerɔma a basi?
Tɛŋ nuruba a dan a kpalim chaab, tɛŋ kala choa le kaasi kama.
Yeri yeŋ dem a dan ta kpaliŋ ale chaab, ba le waaŋ ka chaab.
Dila nyiŋ la Sitaana ale wa tomteerɔma a dan ta chaab, wa naamu a kan baga a zaani a beni.
“Siuk kula po la waai abe dan kan yik pagrɔ a bobiya, wa le nyɛ ka se a jo wa yenni po a zu wa ŋantaŋa?

“Ni basi ate m weeni nyaku de a sak ni ayen, Naawen le voŋ waai meena wabaata ale ba biisi kaasuŋ a te ba kama. Alege wa kan voŋ a te waai ale a le Naawen Chiika la, dii nyiŋ la, wabioku de a boro kama taam wuu.”
(Wa weeni ba wieŋa de kama, dii nyiŋ la nuruma ba gela a weeni kama ayen, “Wa ta ka chichiribiok wa zukku po.” )
Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate Yeezu suaataŋa ale wa mawa a yaa jam a za peelim a wi wa.
Nuru bɔari ale jam za gilim wa a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Fi mawa ale fi suaataŋa a za peelim a yaali fu.”
Wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka wana ale mi ma? Be ka bana ale mi suaata?”
Wa yaa chiem a nya ba meena ale kala a gilim wa la a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni nya, ka mi maba ale mi suaata ale nama.
Baai meena ale a tom dii ate Naawen a yaali la, bala ale mi maba, ale m tɔaba, ale m suaata.”

Yeezu yaa ŋman jam Galili mogi kpeeni noai a sak nuruma Naawen wie. Nuruma a jam piisi ka nna yegayega a za gilim wa ate wa yaa yiri jo ŋaaruŋ po a kala. Ŋaaruŋku a jam bo ka nyiamu po ale ge ate nuruma a yaa za nyiamu noai.
Wa yaa magsi wamagsima a sak ba wie nna yegayega ayen,
“Ni wom mi nalimnyiini. Nuru wanyi ale jam boro a yaa nyini boro a yuk ŋanborinta ase muma la.
Wa yaa ale boro a yuk la, bieŋa gela a yaa lo siuku niŋ ate nuinsa a deri jam pisi ŋa meena,
ŋa gela me a lo tintana po. Ŋa yaa nyini nna nwuli, dii nyiŋ la tantaŋa an jam soa diiya dula jigini.
Wentueŋka ale jam nak ŋa la, ŋa yaa deri ko, dii nyiŋ la ŋa naŋsaŋa an jam baga a siŋ paari nyiamɔa.
Ŋa gela me a lo munsa po a yaa nyini. Munsaŋa me a nyini a geri ŋa ate ŋa an jam baga a biaya.
Ŋa gela me a lo tɛŋ naluŋ po a nyini a chim a biak a be nalimnyiini. Ŋaai ta bie pisita. Ŋa gela me pisiyuebi. Ŋa gela me ta kook.”
Yeezu ale ga nueri wa wamagsini la, wa yaa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “Nama baai ale ta tue a wom la, ni wom mi nalimnyiini.”
Wa ale jam kala wa dek wa nyiini la, baai ale jam a maa va wa ale wa ŋaaŋviirima pi ale bayewa la, a yaa bek wa ayen, “Fi wamagsimaŋa kie ale boa?”
Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Naawen basi kama ayen ni seba wa naamu wasusuŋŋa, alege nuru yonta jigi m sinsaŋŋa a chim ka wamagsima, ate
‘Ba a nya ale a nya alege ba kan nya,
ba a wom ale a wom alege ba kan miŋ ŋa,
dii nyiŋ la, ba dan nya ale miŋ ŋa,
ba le tagri ba wabaata popolaŋa kama ate Naawen voŋ a te ba.’ ”
Yeezu yaa bek ba ayen, “Nama an baga wamagsini de kiri a miŋi? Ni be dan kan baga wamagsini de kiri a miŋi, ni yaa be le nyɛ ka se a baga a miŋ ŋa chaaba?
Nuru waai ale nyini a boro a yuk wa ŋanborintaŋa la, ku a nyɛ se ka Naawen wieŋa ate nuruba a sak la.
Be ŋaai ale lo siuku po la, a nyɛ se ka baai ale a wom wa wieŋa, ale ge ate Sitaana a nyiem a deri jam a yeeri ŋa nwuli a ta nyini ba suniima po a nyini la.
Be ŋaai me ale lo tintanaŋa po la, a nyɛ se ka baai ale a wom wa wieŋa ate ba sue a peenti,
ale ge ate Naawen wieŋa a kan jo ba suniimaŋa po nalimnyiini la. Ba yaa va maga dega, alege ninam a dan yik ba, ba Naawen wieŋa vaka nyiŋ, ba nyiem a deri pa ŋa vaka a basi.
Be ŋaai me ale lo munsaŋa po la, a nyɛ se ka baai ale a wom Naawen wieŋa
alege tɛŋka po wieŋa popolaŋa ale ba ligra yaalika yegayega ale ba ŋanta yaalika, ŋala meena a de ka Naawen wieŋa ate wamaŋ an baga a nyini ŋa po a nyini.

Be ŋaai me ale lo tɛŋ naluŋku po la, a nyɛ se ka baai ale a wom Naawen wieŋa ate ŋa jo ba suniima po nalimnyiini la. Ba a nyɛ se ka ŋantaŋa ale nyini a yaa biak a be ate ŋa gela a ta bie pisita, ŋaai me pisiyuebi, ŋaai me bie kook dii la.”
Yeezu yaa bek ba ayen, “Nuru a dan tɔati wa bolimzeuŋ wa a pa ka chin a vuk ku? Yaase wa a pa a zaani ka gaduok tɛŋka? Aawo, wa a pa ku a zaani ka jaab zuk ate ku a nya dɔkku po meena.
Jaab buuri meena ale chim wasusugi la, a kan ŋman chim wasusugi nuruba jigiya. Dii meena ale ligi doa la, le nyini peelim ate nuruba nya.
Dila nyiŋ, nama baai ale ta tue a wom la, ni wom mi nalimnyiini.”

Wa ŋman pilim weeni ba ayen, “Ni kpesi a wom dii ate m tara ayen m weeni a sak ni la. Magsi kaai ate fi pa a magsi ŋanta a te nuru la, magsi kala degadega ate Naawen le pa magsi a te fi me, ate ku poom gaam taam.
Nuru waai nisa po ale ta la, Naawen le ŋman te wa ŋanta yegayega a gum du, alege waai nisa po ale kan ta la, Naawen le ŋman tuesi jaab fiik kaai ate wa poom ta la kama.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “Naawen Naamu ale a nyɛ dii la ale nna. Nuru ale bori wa talim. Daa meena ate wa goa a yiri la, wa ze ŋantaŋa ale nyɛ dii a nyini ale a chim la.
Ka tɛŋka ale a wuuk bieŋa ate ŋa a nyini ale a chim ale ge a ta bie. Zabuli ale liŋ a chim, a pak a paari kiŋkari, a yaa ga a biak ale ge ate bieŋa a yaa ga kpeglim.
Ŋa yaa ale be a ga nueri la, nuruwa a yaa pa wa gebik a ta cheŋ wa talimu po a ga che dii nyiŋ la, ŋa cheka paari kama.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman bek ba ayen, “Ti le pa ka boa a magsi chaab ale Naawen Naamu?

Bu a nyɛ ase ka nna la. Ase nuru ale pa ‘mastad’ bie a bori la. Bieŋa a posima kama a gaam tɛŋzuk bie meena po. Wa yaa pa ŋa a bori ate ŋa nyini chim tikpieŋsa a ta naŋsa ale yɔgsum nna yegayega ate nuinsa a kali si zuk a yok tugta.”
Wamagsima ŋaai chaab ate Yeezu a jam magsi a sak nuruba la ale nna. Wa jam magsi ka ŋa chaab nna yegayega a gum du ayen baai ale ta Naawen yammu la a baga a miŋ chak.
Wa an jam biisi wari dinyi la ale nuruba alege kan magsi wamagsini. Alege, wa ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a dan jam boro ba dek ba nyiini, wa nyiem a weeni wa wamagsimaŋa kie a sak ba kama.
Dila danni junɔai Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen, “Ni te ti taam mogi kpeeni kauk kuŋkula.”
Wa ŋaaŋviirima yaa basi nuru bɔanni ale cheŋ ga jo Yeezu ale kali ŋaaruŋ kuui po la ayen ba cheŋ. Nuruba ba gela me a jo ŋaarunta a maa va ba ŋaaŋ.
Ba ale a cheŋ la, va kpioŋ a yaa jam a nak ba ŋaaruŋku nna yegayega ate nyiamu me a yiri a jueli wein. Bu yaa jo ba ŋaaruŋku po ate ku a nyɛ ku siŋ nyiamu tɛŋ.
Yeezu a jam dua ŋaaruŋku po ba ŋaaŋ a kpagli ka dafeeluk a goa. Wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa nak wa a yiri a bek wa ayen, “Ti Nyɔnɔ, fi niŋ ka ale ti ni wari nyiamu po?”
Wa yaa yiri wa goomu jigini a zaani ŋmai a yaa weeni vioku ayen ku basi abe nyiamu me a nyɛ balaa. Vioku a yaa deri basi ate nyiamu me a baliŋ. Nyiamu an ŋman choaya ale maga dek me.
Yeezu a yaa bek wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen, “Ka boa ate nama a chali yɔgsumɔa? Nama diem ka siaka?”
Ku yaa cha ba ate ba a bek chaab ayen, “Nuruwa de, ka wana ate wa baga a biisi ale vioku ale nyiamu ate ba a wom wa nɔaya?”
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa taam Galili mogi kpeeni kauk kuŋkula ŋaaŋ nyiŋ a ga paari nuru baai ate ba a wi ayen Gerasa la tɛŋka.
Nuru wanyi a yaa jam bo tɛŋ kala po a ta chichiribiok wa zuk po.
Nuru waai jam karo a baga bobi wa. Ba jam pa ka choarima kpeema a bobi wa, alege wa baga a gebi ŋa.
Ba ŋman pa choarimaŋa ale kuta a bobi wa naŋsa ale wa nisima a ga jiak, alege wa ŋman gebi ŋa me meena. Waai a jam karo a ta pagrim a baga a yik wa.
Wa jam bo ka ba ale a gu nuruba juijui la ale guuta zuima a nyiem a cheŋ ale a kaari nna yegayega ale a pa tintain laasa a gebi wa nyiŋka.

Yeezu ale nyini ŋaaruŋku po a siŋ la, nuruwa a jam za ka nuruma guka jigini ate ku jam yalima. Yeezu a yaa weeni chichiribioku ayen ku nyini nuruwa zukku po a nyini. Nuruwa ale nya Yeezu la, wa yaa chali a jam kpi duna tɛŋ wa niŋ, a yaa kaari nna yegayega a weeni wa ayen, “Fi Yeezu, Naawen kpeeni biika, fi a yaali ka boa mi jigiya? Chali Naawen yonni nyiŋ abe fi kan namsi mu.”
Yeezu yaa bek wa ayen “Fi yoi ale boa?”
Ku yaa weeni wa ayen, “Mi yoi ale ‘Anurubɔari’, dii nyiŋ la ti piisi kama.”
Nuruwa a yaa saalim Yeezu nna yegayega ayen wa kan yiak chichiribaataŋa dula jigini a basi.
Die ale jam piisi nna yegayega a za guuk kunyi zuk dula jigini a de. Ŋa jam paari ka tusa ŋaye.
Chichiribaataŋa a yaa saalim Yeezu ayen wa basi ate ti ga jo dieŋa de po.
Yeezu a yaa te ti siuk. Ti yaa basi nuruwa ale nyini a ga jo dieŋa po ate ŋa meena yaa chali nna nwuli a siŋ ga lo mogi kpeeni nyiamu po a kpi.

Nuru baai ale jam a nya dieŋa zuk la, a yaa chali kuli ba yieŋa a ga weeni ba yieŋa demma ale baai meena ate ba jam a tu ba siuku niŋ la, dii ale nyɛ la. Tɛŋka demma a yaa nyini a cheŋ Yeezu jigi ayen ba nya dii ate baai ale a nya deeŋa la a weeni ba la.
Ba yaa jam a nya nuru waai ate chichiribaataŋa a jam bo wa zukku po la ale wa jo gatta a kala ale Yeezu. Wa an ŋman a yesimu. Yɔgsum a yaa deri yik ba.
Nuru baai ale jam nya dii ale nyɛ nuru wa jigi ale chichiribaataŋa ale dieŋa la, a yaa weeni a sak nuruba meena ale jam bo dula jigini la.
Tɛŋka demma ale wom dii ate ba weeni la, ba yaa jam a saalim Yeezu ayen wa nyini ba tɛŋka po nyini.
Yeezu a yaa ale cheŋ ayen wa jo ŋaaruŋku po la, nuru waai ale jam ta chichiribaataŋa la a jam saalim wa ayen wa basi ate wa maa va wa a cheŋ.
Yeezu an jam siaya, alege weeni wa ayen, “Kuli ga weeni fi yenni demma Nyɔnɔwa ale ta jiirim ale fu a maari fu dii la.”
Nuruwa a yaa cheŋ ga weeni nuru baai ale jam bo tɛŋsa piwa po la dii ate Yeezu a nyɛ a te wa la. Ku yaa cha baai meena ale jam a wom la.
Yeezu yaa ga jo ŋaaruŋku po a gaam taam mogi kpeeni kauk kuŋkula. Wa ale cheŋ a ga paari dula jigini la, nuru bɔari yegayega a yaa tigsi a gilim wa mogini noai.
Juuma tuka dɔkku kpaŋŋa po wanyi ale jam maa bo nuru bɔanni po. Wa yoi a jam ale Jairus. Wa yaa ale ga nya Yeezu la, wa yaa jam wa niŋ
a saalim wa nalimnyiini ayen, “M dek koa, m lie ale a yuak a mɔata kum, ate mi a saalim fu ayen fi jam a pa fi nisa a ji wa zuk ate wa nya nyiŋyɔgsa.”
Yeezu a yaa va Jairus a cheŋ ate nuruba yegayega a yaa maa va wa a gilim wa.
Nipɔk wanyi a yaa jam bo dula a jam a yuak bena pi ale ŋaye. Wa tuemu a jam a nyɛ ase wa a lo ka chiak la. Ku kasim jam a nyɛ ka daa meena.
Tiita nyam yegayega a jam tebi wa a kpeeri. Wa jam kaasi wa ligra meena, alege tuemu an jam a basi wa ale a diem a daani wa me nna yegayega a gum du.
Wa ale wom Yeezu wie la, wa yaa poli wa zuk po ayen, “M dan baga a paari wa garuku nɔanni a tiri, m le nya nyiŋyɔgsa.”
Wa yaa cheŋ a ga jo nuru bɔanni po a ga tu Yeezu a yaa va wa ŋaaŋ a tiri wa garuku nɔanni. Wa le tiri garuku la, wa tuemu a deri basi wa, ate wa yaa miŋ ayen wa nya nyiŋyɔgsa kama dula jigini.
Yeezu a yaa deri miŋ ayen ku nyɛ wa jigi kama ase nuru ale tiri wa a yaa nya nyiŋyɔgsa la. Wa yaa cheemu ayen wa nya ase ka wana a yaa bek ayen, “Ka wana ale tiri mi garuku?”
Wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa weeni ayen, “Fi kan nya nuruma ale piisi a gilim fu dii la, alege ate fi a bek ayen ka wana ale tiri fu?”
Yeezu a yaa diem gisi nya gilim ayen wa nya waai ale tiri wa la.
Nipowa kpaziim a yaa nak ate wa nyiŋka a gok. Wa jam seba ayen Yeezu a tebi wa kama ate wa yaa kpi duna tɛŋ wa niŋ a weeni wa ale wensie meena tuemu wie.
Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ayen, “M lie, fi siaka a basi ate fi nya nyiŋyɔgsa kama. Kuli yeri ale sunum masik, dii nyiŋ la fi tuemu a nueri kama.”
Yeezu ale diem bo dula a biisi la, nuruba ba gela a yaa nyini Jairus yenni a jam wa jigi a weeni wa ayen, “Fi leewa a kpi kama. Kan ŋman a daani Sagrɔwa ayen wa jamu.”
Yeezu ale wom dii ate ba weeni wa la, wa yaa weeni Jairus ayen, “Kan te ku a daani fu, alege kasim ta siaka.”
Yeezu an jam a yaali ayen nuru waai a va ba a cheŋ, alege ka Piita ale Jeemsi ale wa suoku Jɔɔn nyiini.
Ba ale ga paari nya ale ku a nyɛ ŋaglim Jairus yenni po ate nuruma a kumu ale a kaari nna yegayega la,
Yeezu a yaa cheŋ ga jo yenni po a bek ba ayen, “Ka boa ate nama a kum ale a kaari dila? Biika an kpiya. Wa a goa kama.”
Ba yaa deri a la wa wa nina po. Wa yaa yiak ate ba meena a nyini peelim, ale ge a yik biika kowa ale wa mawa ale wa ŋaaŋviirima batawa a yaa ta ba jo biika goomu dɔkku po.
Yeezu a yaa yik biika nisa a weeni wa ayen, “Nipɔkbiliga, yiri.” Ba a weeni ale ba dek tɛŋka biika ayen ka “Talita kumi.”
Nipɔkbinni a yaa deri a yiri zaani ŋmai a cheŋ. Biika jam ta ka bena pi ale ŋaye. Ku yaa cha baai meena ale jam bo dula jigini la nna yegayega.
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen ba nyɛ ŋandiinta a te wa ate wa de, ale ge kaam ba me ayen, “Ni kan basi ate nuru a wom dii ate mi nyɛ la.”
Yeezu yaa basi dula jigini ale ge cheŋ tɛŋ kaai ate wa liŋ jam boro la. Wa ŋaaŋviirima me a yaa va wa a cheŋ.

Ba ale diem bo dula jigini la, Juuma Vuusum Danni yaa paari ate ba cheŋ ga jo ba tuka dɔkku po ate, wa yaa sak nuruma Naawen wieŋa. Nuruba yegayega a jam bo dula jigini a wom Yeezu sinsaŋŋa ate ku yaa cha ba. Ba yaa bek chaab ayen, “Nuruwa de a nyɛ ka se a seba nna? Ka boan jaab yam ale nna ate Naawen te wa? Wa nyɛ ka se a tom wakperikaliisaŋa nna?
Daa wala ale chapentawa a bo dela la? Daa Mɛɛri biika ale la? Daa wa suaata ale Jeemsi ale Josesi ale Judas ale Simon la? Wa tɔama me an bo daa dela la?” Dila nyiŋ ate Nazaret demma a jam zɛri wa.
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Waai meena a te Naawen biisiteerɔwa zula kama, alege ka wa dek tɛŋka demma ale wa suaataŋa, ale wa yenni demma nyiini ale kan a te wa zula.”
Wa ale jam bo dula jigini la, wa an jam baga a nyɛ wariya alege, wa jam pa ka wa nisa a ji yɔgnyeensa ba gela zuima tebi ba.
Ku jam cha wa ka nna yegayega ale nuruma ale jam kan ta siaka la.
Ba yaa basi dula jigini ale ge cheŋ tɛŋfiik sii ale jam bo dula la, a sak nuruba Naawen wieŋa.
Wa yaa wi wa ŋaaŋviirima pi ale bayewa ate ba jam a tigsi chaab wa jigi ayen wa tom ba baye baye. Wa yaa te ba pagrim ate ba baga a yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po a basi.

Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nama ale a cheŋ la, ni kan pa koalima a yaase ŋandiinta, a yaase fotta, a yaase ligra dek me. Ni kan pa gatta ti chaab a gum ga tii ate ni jo la po. Ni su nuensa abe ni pa tachegsa nyiini a nyo ni nisima po a ta cheŋ.
Ni dan cheŋ ga paari tɛŋ kanyi ate ba te ni dɔk ayen ni goa, ni kasim a goa dɔk kula po a ta ga paari diipo ate ni a basi tɛŋ kala la.

Ni dan jam paari tɛŋ kanyi ate tɛŋ kala demma a dan kan te ni tia a yaase ba an wom dii ate ni ta ayen ni weeni a sak ba la, ni basi dula jigini abe ni kpaanti ni naŋsaŋa paasuku a basi dula ate ku sak ayen ni a kaam ba kama ba ale zɛri Naawen wieŋa la nyiŋ.”
Yeezu a yaa ale sak ba a ga nueri la, ba yaa cheŋ ayen ba ga sak nuruma Naawen wieŋa, ate ba basi ba tuimbaataŋa abe ba ŋman va Naawen wensie siuku.
Ba jam a yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po yegayega a basi ale a pa kpaam a boori a nyo yuariba zuima zuk a tebi ba.

Naab Ayerod a jam wom Yeezu wie kama, dii nyiŋ la waai meena a yaa jam a biisi ka Yeezu wie. Ba gela a jam a weeni ayen wa ka Jɔɔn waai ale a te nuruba soka la, ale yiri kum po. Ka dila nyiŋ ale soa ate wa baga a tom wakperikaliisaŋa de.
Ba gela a pa wa chim ka Naawen biisiteerɔwa waai ale jam boro ate ba a wi ayen Elaja la.
Ba gela me a jam a weeni ayen, “Wa ka Naawen biisiteerɔ waai ale a nyɛ ase baai ate Naawen jam tom la.”
Naab Ayerod ale wom Yeezu wie la, wa yaa weeni wa dek ayen, “Nuruwa de ka Jɔɔn waai ale jam a te nuruma soka la. Mi basi ate ba gebi wa zukku kama alege wa ŋman yiri kum po.”

Ayerod a jam faari ka wa suoku waai ate ba a wi ayen Filip la, powa. Wa powa yoi a jam le Ayerodiasi. Jɔɔn a liŋ jam weeni Ayerod kama ayen, “Fi ale nyɛ dii ale fi suoku powa la, an va Juuma Sinsaŋŋa yaalika.”
A nyini da ŋala po a ta a cheŋ, Ayerodiasi a jam kisi Jɔɔn kama a yaa be a yaali ayen wa ko wa, alege wa an jam nya siuwa dii nyiŋ la, Ayerod a jam yik wa a lik ka dɔk po.

Ayerod a jam a chali Jɔɔn ka yɔgsum ale a te wa zula me, dii nyiŋ la wa seba ayen Jɔɔn ka nuru maŋ ale nuru weleŋ. Ka dila nyiŋ ale soa ate Ayerod an jam siak ayen ba ko wa. Jɔɔn sinsaŋŋa a jam a daani Ayerod ka nna yegayega alege wa diem a yaali ayen wa wom dii ate wa ta la.

Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate Ayerodiasi da soŋku a yaa jam. Ayerod biamu danni ale jam paari la, wa yaa wi wa kpak kpeemaŋa ale wa sojima kpaŋŋa ale nuru kpeentaŋa baai meena ale jam bo Galili tɛŋka po la ayen ba jam maa de wa biamu danni ŋandiintaŋa.

Ba ale jam tigsi chaab a boro a de la, Ayerodiasi leewa a yaa jo dɔk kuui ate ba kala a de la po, a yaa gogi sak ba. Wa gogtaŋa a jam te Ayerod ale wa dɔama ka supeentik nna yegayega, ate Ayerod a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Fi ale a yaali jaab buui la, m le te fu.”
Wa yaa ŋman pe a weeni wa ayen, “Jaab buui meena ate fi a yaali la, weeni mu, ate m te fu. Fi dan a yaali m tɛŋka naamu geli m le pa te fu.”
Nipɔkbinni a yaa nyini a cheŋ wa mawa jigi a yaa bek wa ayen, “Ka boa ate fi a yaali ayen m bek naawa jigiya?”
Wa mawa a yaa weeni wa ayen wa bek wa ate wa gebi Jɔɔn zukku a te wa.
Wa yaa ŋman pilim a ga jo naawa jigi nna nwuli a weeni wa ayen, “Mi a yaali ayen fi gebi ka Jɔɔn zukku yɔgyɔgla de a pa dueni taasi tanlaŋ po ate ba ta jam a te mu.”

Wa ale weeni nna la, ku jam kaasi Ayerod popola ka nna yegayega, alege wa an jam baga a zɛriya, dii nyiŋ la wa jam pe kama wa dɔama nimbie po ayen wa le te wa jaab buui meena ate wa a juisi wa jigi la.
Wa yaa tom wa sojima po wanyi ayen wa gebi Jɔɔn zukku a ta jam. Sojiwa yaa cheŋ juijui ate ba lik Jɔɔn la a yaa gebi wa zukku
a pa dueni taasi tanlaŋ po a ta ŋmani a cheŋ ga te nipɔkbinni. Wa yaa tuesi a ta ga te wa mawa.
Jɔɔn ŋaaŋviirima ale jam wom dii ale nyɛ la, ba yaa ga pa wa nyiŋka a ta ga gu puŋ vorub po.
Yeezu tuimtomdɔma pi ale bayewa baai ate wa jam tom ba la, a yaa ŋman jam wa jigi a weeni wa dii meena ate ba tom ale dii meena ate ba sak nuruma la.

Bala ale Yeezu an jam nya siuk a kali de ŋandiinta, dii nyiŋ la nuruba yegayega a kasim a jam kama ale a kuli. Dila nyiŋ la, wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni jam ate ti cheŋ jigi yoŋ ti dek ti nyiini a ga vuusi maga.”
Ba yaa basi dula jigini ale ge cheŋ a ga jo ŋaaruŋ po ayen ba cheŋ juijui ate nuru karo la.
Ba ale jam a cheŋ la, nuruba yegayega a yaa nya ba a deri miŋ ba. Ba yaa nyini ba tɛŋsaŋa po a chali va kuŋkɔŋini a de ba niŋ a ga paari ŋaaruŋku ale a cheŋ juijui la.

Yeezu ale nyini ŋaaruŋku po a siŋ la, wa yaa nya nuru bɔari nna yegayega ale ba za a limsi wa. Wa nya ba ase ba ka pa ŋaai ale kan ta naapeerik la. Wa jiirim a yaa jam bo ale ba ate wa yaa sak ba wie nna yegayega dula jigini.
Ba ale jam za dula jigini ate ku beni la, Yeezu ŋaaŋviirima a yaa jam wa jigi a weeni wa ayen, “Nya ti bo ka sagi po dela jigini ate wenni me a siŋ ti.
Basi ate nuruma a cheŋ tɛŋ sii ale mɔata la po a ga da ŋandiinta a de.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nama dek a te ba ŋandiinta ate ba de.”
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Ee, ti le nya ligra ka be ate ŋa paari a da ŋandiinta, ate ba de chagi?”
Yeezu ŋman bek ba ayen, “Ka boan ŋandiinta ate ni tara? Ni cheŋ a ga gisi nya.”
Ba yaa cheŋ a ga nya ale ŋman pilim a jam weeni wa ayen, “Ti ta ka borobotta tinu ale juma ŋaye nyiini.”
Wa yaa weeni nuruma meena ate ba kali tɛŋ wuuku po, nuruba kook kook, ba gela me pisinu pisinu a ga nueri.

Di ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate Yeezu yaa pa borobotta tinuwa ale juma ŋayewa a yaa zak wa zuk nya wenŋmazuk a te Naawen jiam. Wa ale nyɛ Naawen jiam a ga nueri la, wa yaa ŋmari borobottaŋa ale jumaŋa a te wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen ba pa chari nuruma.
Waai meena a jam ŋobi chak kama.
Ba ale ŋobi a ga nueri la, Yeezu ŋaaŋviirima a yaa pa ŋandiin tii ale tali la a sueri busisa pi ale siye.
Nidɔa baai ale jam de ŋandiintaŋa la a jam ka tusa ŋanu.

Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen ba cheŋ a ga jo ŋaaruŋku po a taam mogi kpeeni kauk kuŋkula ŋaaŋ nyiŋ a ga paari tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Beteseida la, abe ba ge ate wa banti nuru bɔanni ate ba kuli ba yieŋa.
Wa ale banti ba a ga nueri la, wa yaa cheŋ a ga jueli guuk kunyi zuk ayen wa puusi a te Naawen.
Junɔai ale jam paari la, Yeezu a jam za ka guuku zuk wa dek wa nyiini. Wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa jam kala ŋaaruŋku po mogi kpeeni nyiamu sunsuŋ.

Wa yaa nya ale vioku a nak ba ŋaaruŋku ate ba an baga a paari kuŋkɔŋini. Ku ale jam paari ate vari kpadiaka a kum la, wa yaa nyini guuku zuk a siŋ a cheŋ nyiamu zuk a ga ba jigi a yaa be a yaali ayen wa gaam ba a taam.
Ba meena ale nya wa ale wa a cheŋ nyiamu zuk la, ba yaa pa chim ayen, “Wa ka kok.”
Ba kpaziim a nak ate ba kaari nna yegayega.
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ka mi. Ni kan chali yɔgsumɔa, ni basi ate ni nyiŋsaŋa a pagra.”
Wa yaa jam jo ŋaaruŋku po a gum ba po. Wa ale jo a ga nueri la, vioku a yaa deri zaani. Ku yaa cha ba nna yegayega.
Ku jam cha ba, dii nyiŋ la, ba an jam miŋ Yeezu ale nyɛ dii a pa borobottaŋa a chari nuru bɔanni la kiriya. Ba popolaŋa a jam lik kama.
Ba yaa ale gaam taam a ga paari kauk kuŋkula ŋaaŋ nyiŋ la, ba yaa jam paari tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Genesaret la. Dula jigini ba yaa bobi ba ŋaaruŋku a zaani.
Yeezu ale nyini ŋaaruŋku po a siŋ la, nuruba a yaa deri miŋ wa,
ate ba deri chali jo tɛŋka po meena ayen ba weeni a sak nuruba wa ale jam la. Juijui meena ate ba jam wom ayen wa boro la, ba yaa pa ba yuaroma a dueni ŋanta zuk a ta ga wa jigi ayen wa tebi ba.

Yeezu a yaa nyiem gilim tɛŋkpieŋsa ale tɛŋ fiisa ale tɛŋ kpaŋsa meena po. Nuruma ale ga wom ayen Yeezu cheena la, ba yaa chali kuli ba yieŋa a ta ba yuaroma a cheŋ yabaŋa po a saalim wa ayen wa basi ate ba tiri wa garuku nɔanni ate ba nya nyiŋyɔgsa. Baai meena ale tiri wa garuku la, a nya nyiŋyɔgsa kama.
Farisiima ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ba gela a yaa nyini Jerusalem tɛŋka a jam tigsi chaab a gilim Yeezu.
Ba ale diem a jam bo wa jigi la, ba yaa nya ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a kaasi ba kisitaŋa kunyi, dii nyiŋ la ba an nari ba nisimaŋa ase Farisiima kisitaŋa ale a va dii la.
(Farisiima ale Juuma meena a nyiem kasim a va ka ba kokpieŋsaŋa kisuk kuui ale a sak ba ayen ba nyiem nari ba nisimaŋa abe ba de ŋandiinta la.

Ba dan nyini yaba a kuli, ba a de ka niŋ a sugri ba dek ale ge a de ŋandiinta. Ba a va ka ba kokpieŋsaŋa kisitaŋa meena tii ale a sak ba ayen ba a nari ba samɔnsa tɔgatɔga ale ba beerisa tɔgatɔga ale ba taasa tɔgatɔga la.)
Farisiima ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma yaa bek Yeezu ayen, “Ka boa nyiŋ ate fi ŋaaŋviirima a zɛri ti kokpieŋsaŋa nisima narika kisiku ale ge a de ŋandiinta?”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nama ka venta nyam. Naawen biisiteerɔwa Azaya ale jam ŋmarisi nama wie a nyo Naawen gbaŋka po dii la ka wensie. Wa ŋmarisi ayen Naawen a weeni ayen,
‘Nuruma de a puusi mi ale ka ba noa nyiini,
alege ba suniimaŋa a ka mi jigiya.
Ba pa ka nurubiik kisita a sak nuruba ale a weeni ayen ti ka Naawen kisita.
Ka dila nyiŋ ale soa ate ba puusaŋa chim kinla mi jigi la.’
“Nama a basi ka Naawen Sinsaŋŋa vaka ale a va ni kokpieŋsaŋa kisitaŋa.
“Nama pa ka ni dek yam a zɛri Naawen Sinsaŋŋa vaka ayen ni nya siuk a va ni dek kisita sinsaŋŋa.
Moosis a jam ŋmarisi Naawen gbaŋka po ayen, ‘Ku a fe ate ni a zuli ni koba ale ni maba. Wa ŋman ŋmarisi ayen waai ale a le wa ko a yaase wa ma la, ku a fe ate ba ko wa.’

Alege nama nyiem a kasim a sak nuruba ayen nuru waai a dan weeni wa ko ale wa ma ayen jaab buui ate wa pa maari ba la ka ‘koban’ jaab, ku magsi ka wa kan a maari ba. ‘Koban’ kiri ale jaab buui ate ba a te Naawen la.
Ase nama a dan a nyɛ dila, ni a va ka ni dek sinsaŋŋa, ni a kaasi ka Naawen Sinsaŋŋa. Wie ŋa chaab nna degadega ate ni pa a sak nuruba ayen ba a va ŋa.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman wi nuru bɔanni ate ba jam wa jigi ate wa weeni ba ayen, “Nama meena lak ni tueŋa a wom abe ni miŋ chak.
Ŋanta baai ale a jo ni puusa po la, a kan te ni daŋta, alege ka ŋanta baai ale a nyini ni noaŋa po a nyini la, ale a te ni daŋta.
Nama baai ale ta tue a wom la, ni wom nalimnyiini.”
Yeezu yaa ale basi nuru bɔanni ale ge cheŋ ga jo dɔk la, wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa bek wa wa wamagsini kiri.
Yeezu a yaa tulisi ba ayen, “Nama an baga miŋ ayen ŋanta baai ale jo ni po la a kan te ni daŋta? Nama ze chak mi ale a weeni dii la?
Ba kan jo ni suniimaŋa po, ba a jo ka ni puusaŋa po a yaa ŋman pilim a nyini.” (Yeezu a weeni ba wieŋa de ayen ŋa sak ba ate ba kan ŋman a ta kisita ale ŋandiinta.)
Wa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “Wie ŋaai ale a nyini nuru sunum po a nyini la, ale a te wa daŋta.

Popola ŋaai ale bo nuruba suniima po la ale a basi ate ba a poli wabaata ale a basi ate ba a yaali nipooba ale nidɔaba, zueba, nuru kooroba, kaboŋ nyeerisa, butuom nyam, gaasa nyam, pimpaasima nyam, a tom tuim gbentisa, a de nyuri ale chaab, ale a le Naawen, kanjanta nyam, ale a tom betta tuima.
Wabaataŋa de meena ale a nyini ba suniimaŋa po a nyini la, ale a kaasi ba.”
Yeezu a yaa basi dula jigini ale ge cheŋ Taaya ale Saidon tɛŋsaŋa po. Wa yaa cheŋ ga jo yeri dinyi po ayen wa suk wa dek ate waai a kan seba ayen wa bo dula, alege wa an jam baga a nya sukka jigiya.

Nipɔk wanyi ale jam boro a yaa wom Yeezu wie. Nipowa kowa ale wa mawa a jam daa Juuba. Ba biak wa ka juijui ate ba a wi ayen Fonisia ate ka bo Siriya tɛŋka po la. Chichiribiok a yaa jam bo nipowa lie zuk po. Wa yaa wom Yeezu wari a yaa cheŋ wa jigi a ga kpi duna tɛŋ wa niŋ a saalim wa ayen wa yiak chichiribioku ate ku nyini wa leewa zukku po a nyini.
Yeezu a yaa tulisi nipowa ale wamagsini ayen, “Basi ate ba liŋ pa ŋandiinta a te bisa ate ba de chak. Ku an magsi ayen ba pa bisaŋa ŋandiintaŋa a te baasa ate si de.”
Nipowa a yaa weeni wa ayen, “M Nyɔnɔ, dii ate fi a weeni la ka wensie, alege baasaŋa a nyiem a de ka ŋandiin tii ate bisaŋa a de ale tali la.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman weeni wa ayen, “Fi ale tulisi mu dii la ale soa ate mi a weeni fu ayen kuli yeri ale chichiribioku a poom basi fi leewa kama.”
Nipowa a yaa ale ga paari wa yenni la, wa yaa nya wa leewa ale wa dua wa goomu tiaka po. Chichiribioku a sum basi wa kama.
Yeezu a yaa basi Taaya tɛŋka ale ŋman pilim a jam va Saidon tɛŋka po a taam ga va Dekapolis wa po a taam cheŋ Galili mogi kpeeni.

Wa ale ga paari dula la, nuruba a yaa ta nuru ate wa tue a kpari ate wa an baga a biisi nalimnyiini me. Ba yaa ta wa a jam Yeezu jigi a saalim wa ayen wa pa wa nisaŋa a vi wa nyiŋka ate wa nya nyiŋyɔgsa.
Yeezu a yaa yik wa a ta nyini nuru bɔanni po a taam nakpiak a yaa pa wa nandubsa siye a su nuruwa tueŋa po, ale ge a chesi tintueta a pa tiri nuruwa giŋgeluŋku.
Yeezu ale nyɛ dila a nueri la, wa yaa zak a nya wenŋmazuk a yaa ŋusi a weeni nuruwa ayen, “Efata.” Ku kiri ale, “Lagri.”
Wa tueŋa a deri a wom ate wa giŋgeluŋku me a labri ate wa yaa baga a biisi nalimnyiini.
Yeezu a yaa weeni nuru baai ale ta wa a jam la bunyi dekki ayen ba kan weeni a sak waai dii ale nyɛ la, alege ba zɛri ale ŋmasi a jalisi wa a gum du ate nuruba yegayega a wom.
Ku yaa cha waai meena ate ba a weeni chaab ayen, “Nuruwa de a nyɛ wie meena ka nalimnyiini. Nya wa ale poom baga a nyɛ dii a tebi nuru waai tueŋa ale ka a wom ate wa an baga a biisi nalimnyiini la.”

Da ale ŋman jam taam la, nuru bɔari yegayega a ŋman tigsi chaab a gilim Yeezu. Ba ale jam kan ŋman ta ŋandiinta ayen ba de la, Yeezu a yaa wi wa ŋaaŋviirima ate ba jam wa jigi ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen,
“M jiirim a bo ale nuruma de, dii nyiŋ la ba ale bo ale mu daa ŋatawa de, alege ba ka ŋandiinta a de la.
M dan basi ate ba kuli ale kommu, ba le cha kama dii nyiŋ la ba kan ta pagrim a cheŋ paari ba yieŋa. Ba gela a nyini ka niŋniŋa a jam.”
Wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa weeni ayen dela ka sagi po. “Ti le nya ŋandiinta ka be dela jigini ate ti paari nuruma de a soa nna?”
Yeezu yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boan ŋandiinta ate ni tara?”
Ba yaa tulisi wa ayen, “Ti ta ka borobotta tiyopoi.”

Wa yaa weeni nuru bɔanni meena ayen ba kali tɛŋ. Ba yaa ale kali a nueri la, wa yaa pa borobottaŋa tiyopoiwa a yaa puusi a te Naawen ayen wa niak ŋandiintaŋa, a yaa ale ge a ŋmari te wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen ba pa chari nuru bɔanni. Ba yaa pa chari ba meena.
Wa ŋaaŋviirima me a jam ta juma maga dega ale ba. Yeezu a yaa tuesi ŋa a ŋman puusi a te Naawen ayen wa niak ŋa a yaa ale ge a pa te wa ŋaaŋviirima ate ba pa chari nuru bɔanni ŋmani.

Ba meena yaa ŋobi chak, ale ge ate Yeezu ŋaaŋviirima a pisi ŋandiin tii ale tali la a sueri busisa siyopoi. Baai ale jam de ŋandiintaŋa la, a jam ka nuruba tusa ŋanaansi. Ba ale nyɛ dila a nueri la, wa yaa basi ate nuru bɔanni meena a kuli.
Wa ale wa ŋaaŋviirima deri jo ŋaaruŋ po nwuli a cheŋ ga paari tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Dalimanuta la.

Farisiima ba gela a yaa jam Yeezu jigi a deri ta nampaga ale wa. Ba jam a yaali ayen ba yik wa kama. Ba yaa weeni wa ayen wa nyɛ wakperikaliik ate ku sak ayen wa pagrimu a sum nyini ka Naawen jigi la.
Yeezu a yaa weeni ayen “Mm, ka boa ale soa ate jinla demma yaali ayen ba nya wakperikaliiga? Mi a weeni ni ka wensie, nama ale a yaali dii la, m kan te ate ni nya di.”
Wa yaa basi ba ale ŋman ga jo ŋaaruŋku po ayen wa gaam a taam mogi kpeeni kauk kuŋkula.
Ba ale jam boro a gomsi ayen ba cheŋ dula la, Yeezu ŋaaŋviirima a yaa baŋ ba ŋandiintaŋa a basi ŋaaŋ. Boroboruk kunyi dekki ate ba jam pa nyo ŋaaruŋku po.
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni a limsi abe ni a kpesi ni dek ale Farisiima ale Naawa Ayerod dabintaŋa.”
Wa ale weeni dila la, ba yaa bek chaab ayen, “Ka tama ale kan ta ti boroboruku la ale soa ate wa a weeni dila?”
Yeezu a yaa seba dii ate ba jam a biisi la ate wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boa ale soa ate ni a biisi ayen ni ka ŋandiinta? Nama an diem baga a miŋi? Ku a nyɛ ase ni tueŋa a diem kpari kama la.
Nama diem a nyɛ ase ka nuru baai ate Naawen biisi ba wie wa gbaŋka po dila po dila po la. Ni ta nina kama alege ni kan nya. Ni be ta tue me kama, alege ni kan womu.
Nama baga a teeri diipo ate mi pa borobotta tinuwa a ŋmari chari nuruba tusa ŋanuwa la? Boroboruk talaŋa a jam sueri ka busisa si dina?”
Ba yaa ŋman weeni wa ayen, “Ti sueri ka busisa pi ale siye.”
Wa ŋman bek ba ayen, “Mi ale pa borobotta tiyopoiwa a ŋmari chari nuruba tusa ŋanaansiwa la, boroboruk talaŋa a sueri ka busisa si dina?”
Ba yaa ŋman weeni wa ayen, “Ti sueri ka busisa siyopoi.”
Wa yaa ŋman bek ba ayen, “Nama an diem a miŋya?”
Ba yaa jam paari tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Beteseida. Nuruba ba gela a yaa jam ta yio wanyi a jam Yeezu jigi a saalim wa ayen wa pa wa nisaŋa a tiri wa nyiŋka ate wa ninaŋa a lagri.
Yeezu a yaa yik nuruwa nisaŋa a ta wa a nyini tɛŋka po a nyini a yaa chesi tintueta basi nuruwa ninaŋa po ale ge pa wa nisimaŋa me a vi nuruwa zuk ale bek wa ayen, “Fi baga a nya jaabɔa?”
Nuruwa a yaa lagi wa ninaŋa ayen wa nya, wa yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Mi a nya ka nuruba m niŋ ase tiisa la ate ba nyiem a cheŋ.”
Yeezu a ŋman pilim pa wa nisimaŋa a tiri nuruwa ninaŋa, ate ŋa yaa lagri ate wa yaa nya nna cheri.
Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Kuli yeri, kan cheŋ tɛŋka po.”

Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa cheŋ tɛŋfiik sii ale jam gilim tɛŋ kaai ate ba a wi ayen Siizariya Filipai la. Ase ba ale jam bo siuku po a cheŋ la, wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Nuruba a weeni ayen mi ka wana?”
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Ba gela ayen fi ka Jɔɔn waai ale jam a te nuruma soka la, ba gela me ayen fi ka Elaja. Mbala me a weeni ayen fi ka Naawen biisiteerɔma po wanyi.”
Wa yaa ŋman bek ba ayen, “Nama dek a weeni ayen mi ka wana?”
Piita a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Fi ale Kirisitawa waai ate Naawen a jam weeni ayen wa le tom wa ate wa jam vari nuruba a basi la.”
Yeezu a yaa kaam ba ayen, “Ni kan weeni dila a sak waai ya.”

Dula jigini Yeezu a yaa pilim jam boro a sak ba ayen, “Nuruba le basi ate Mi Saalobiika a nam nna yegayega. Juuma kpaŋŋa ale Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ale zɛri mu, abe ba basi ate nuruba ko mu alege daa ŋata a dan paari m le yiri kum po.”
Wa biisi dila a lagri kama ayen ba miŋ chak. Piita ale wom wa wieŋa la, wa yaa yik wa a ta wa taam nakpiak a tɔariŋ wa wa ale weeni dila la nyiŋ.
Yeezu a yaa gisi nya wa ŋaaŋviirima meena ale ge a yaa tɔariŋ Piita ayen, “Cheŋ du mi niŋ, Sitaana nyɔnɔ. Fi ale a biisi dii la an nyini daa Naawen jigiya, alege di nyini ka nurubiik jigi.”

Yeezu a yaa wi wa ŋaaŋviirima ale nuru bɔanni ate ba jam wa jigi ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nuru a dan a yaali ayen wa va mi ŋaaŋ, basi ate wa liŋ zɛri wa dek yaalika abe wa gomsi wa dek a magsi kum abe wa jam va mu.

Nuru waai nina a dan muni ayen wa vari wa dek nyuvuri a basi, kula nyɔnɔwa le jogi di kama, alege nuru waai a dan jogi wa nyuvuri wa le va mi la nyiŋ ale wa siaka ale Naawen wamaŋsaŋa nyiŋ, kula nyɔnɔwa le vari di a basi.
Dila nyiŋ la, ka boan jaab nyuenta ate nuru le nya ase wa nin nya tɛŋzuk meena masimu ale ge jogi wa nyuvuriya?
Jaab karo ate kula nyɔnɔwa le pa tagri a nya wa nyuvunni ase wa nin jogi di.

Yɔgyɔgla de, nama boro ale ka nuru baai ale ta gaasa ale a zɛri Naawen siuku vaka la. Da yeŋ po, Mi Saalobiika, le ŋman pilim jam tɛŋzuk de ale m Kowa nyagsika ale sabiilo welensaŋa. Nuru baai ale va mi la po wanyi, abe dan a chali chivie ale mi vaka yɔgyɔgla de, mi me a dan jam m le zɛri kula nyɔnɔwa.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Wensie ate mi a weeni ni, nama baai ale bo dela la, gela a kan kpi ase ka ba nin nya Naawen naamu ale bu cheena ale pagrim.”
Daa ŋayuebi ale jam taam la, Yeezu a yaa wi Piita ale Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn a ta ba jueli guuk kpioŋ kunyi zuk ba dek ba nyiini. Ba ale jam bo dula jigini la, Yeezu a yaa deri tagri ba niŋ.
Wa gattaŋa me a tagri ale peenti a nyagsi nna kpelimkpelim. Nuru waai a jam ka a baga a nyɛ ate ti a peenti ale a nyagsi dila.
Ba yaa nya Elaja ale Moosis ale ba boro a biisi ale Yeezu.
Piita a yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Sagrɔ, tama ale bo dela la ku nala kama. Basi ate ti pili viita tita a te ni ate fi soa kunyi abe Moosis a soa kunyi abe Elaja me a soa kunyiwa.”
Wa jam ze dii ate wa le weeni la, dii nyiŋ la wa ale mbala a jam a chali ka yɔgsum yegayega.
Wein chiŋmari a yaa jam lik ba ate ba wom lueluk ale ku nyini chiŋmanni po a weeni ba ayen, “Mi be kaai ate m sui a mariŋ la ale nna. Ni wom wa.”
Ba ale wom a nueri la, ba yaa gisi nya ale nuru karo, ka Yeezu nyiini ale jam bo dula jigini ale ba.
Ba ale basi guuku zuk a siŋ la, Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Dii ate ni poom nya la, ni kan weeni a sak waaiya, ase ka dai dii dai ate Mi Saalobiika a yiri kum po la.”
Ba yaa siak wa ale weeni dii la ale pa ŋa a nyo ba suniima po ale a bek chaab ayen, “Wa kummu po yirika kiri ale boa?”
Ba yaa bek Yeezu ayen, “Ka boa ate Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma a weeni ayen ka Naawen biisiteerɔwa Elaja le wa liŋ jam abe wa ge ate Kirisitawa a jamu?”

Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ku ka wensie, Naawen gbaŋka sum weeni dila kama ayen Elaja le wa liŋ jam a gomsi jaab buuri meena. Jɔɔn waai ale jam a te nuruma soka la ale jam sum jam ate ku sak ayen Elaja ale la a jamu. Nuruba abe nyɛ wa dii ate ba a yaali la kama. Nyaku de abe a sak kama ayen Naawen ale ŋmarisi dii wa gbaŋka po la ka wensie. Naawen gbaŋka abe weeni kama ayen dai dii dai ate Mi Saalobiika le jam la, nuruba le zɛri mu a basi ate m namu nna yegayega.”
Ba ale jam biisi ale chaab a nueri la, ba yaa jam gum chaab ale wa ŋaaŋviirima mbala ate nuru bɔari yegayega a za gilim ba ate Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ba gela a yaa ta nampaga ale ba.
Nuru bɔanni ale jam nya Yeezu la, ku yaa cha ba nna yegayega ate ba yaa chali ga tu wa a puusi wa.
Yeezu a yaa bek wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen, “Ka boa ate nama ta nampaga ale sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma?”
Nuru wanyi yaa jam bo nuru bɔanni po a weeni wa ayen, “Sagrɔ, chichiribiok ale bo m biik zuk po ate wa an baga a biisi, wa be kan wom me.

Chichiribioku a dan ga yiri, ku nyiem a pa wa kama a kasim a fobi tɛŋ diipo meena ate tintupuuk a nyini wa nɔanni po a nyini ate wa a ŋobi wa nyinaŋa ate wa nyiŋka me a deri. M be ta wa jam ka fi jigi alege fi poom karo ate m yaa saalim fi ŋaaŋviirima ayen ba yiak chichiribioku wa zukku po a basi alege ba an baga a nyeya.”

Yeezu a yaa chiem a weeni wa ŋaaŋviirima ayen, “Oo, nama ka siaka. Nama a yaali ayen mi bo ale ni a paari ka dimpo? Mi le ta suduŋni ale ni a paari ka dimpo?” Wa yaa ŋman weeni biika kowa ayen, “Ta biika jam dela.”
Wa yaa ta wa a jam Yeezu jigi.
Chichiribioku ale ga nya Yeezu la, ku yaa deri yiri nna yegayega a pa biika a fobi tɛŋka ate wa yaa a bilim ate tintupuuk a nyini wa nɔanni po a nyini.
Yeezu a yaa bek biika kowa ayen, “Chichiribioku ale jo fi biika la, ka benaŋa dina?”
Wa kowa a yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Ku jo wa ka wa bifiik po.
Dai po dai po ku a yuk wa kama a lonsi bolim po ale nyiam po ayen ku ko wa. Fi dan baga a maari ti, be maari ti.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman bek wa ayen, “Ka boa ate fi a begi ayen ase m nin baga? Wie meena a baga a nyɛ kama a te nuru waai ale ta siaka la.”
Biika kowa a yaa deri kaari a weeni ayen, “Mi ta siaka kama, alege m siaka an soa diiya. Maari mu ate m ta siaka a gum du.”

Ba ale jam boro a biisi ale chaab la, nuru bɔari yegayega a yaa deri chali cheena Yeezu jigi. Wa ale nya ba la wa yaa deri weeni chichiribioku ayen, “Fi, chichiribiok kuui ale basi ate biika de an baga a biisi ale kan wom la, mi a biisi ale ka fi. Nyini biika jigi a nyini abe fi kan ŋman jo a bo ale wa.”
Chichiribioku a yaa deri kaari nna yegayega a yuk wa a lonsi ale ge yaa nyini biika nyiŋka po a nyini, ale ge ate wa dua ase wa kpi la ate nuruba yegayega a jam a weeni ayen, “Wa kpi kama.”
Yeezu a yaa yik wa nisaŋa a zak wa a zaani ŋmai.
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima ale cheŋ a ga jo dɔk po ba dek ba nyiini la, ba yaa bek wa ayen, “Ka boa ale soa ate tama an baga a yiak chichiribioku ate ku a nyini biika jigiya?”
Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Chichiribioku de choawa ni dan kan puusi a te Naawen nalimnyiini, ni an baga a yiak ate ku a nyini.”
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima yaa basi dula ale wa cheŋ taam Galili tɛŋka po. Ba yaa ale a cheŋ la, Yeezu a kan jam a yaali ayen nuru seba ba ale a cheŋ juijui la,

dii nyiŋ la wa a sak ka wa ŋaaŋviirima dii le cheena ayen di nyɛ la. Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nuruba le jam yik Mi Saalobiika, a ta ga nyo nuru baai ale ba ko mu la nisa po, alege daa ŋata a dan paari, m le yiri kum po.”
Wa ale weeni dila la, ba an jam miŋ dii ate wa a biisi la kiriya, alege ba jam a chali ka yɔgsum ale wa bekka.
Ba yaa jam paari Kapernaum tɛŋka po a ga jo yeri po. Yeezu a yaa bek ba ayen, “Ti ale poom bo siuku po a cheena la, ka boan jaab nampaga ate nama poom a nagi?”
Alege ba an weeni wa wariya, dii nyiŋ la ba ale poom bo siuku po la, ba ta ka nampaga ase ka ba wana ale wa chim kpagi a gaam ba meena.

Yeezu a yaa kali tɛŋ a wi wa ŋaaŋviirima pi ale bayewa ate ba jam wa jigi ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni basi niŋ dekka yaalika. Nuru waai ale a yaali ayen wa chim niŋ deero la, ku a fe ate wa pa wa dek a zaani ŋaaŋ abe wa chim ba meena tomteerɔ.”
Wa yaa yik biik wanyi a ta jam zaani ba sunsuŋ a pa wa nisaŋa a gbaari wa ale weeni ba ayen,
“Nuru waai ale a tuesi biik ase bisaŋa de wanyi mi nyiŋ la, ka mi ale la ate wa a tuesi. Nuru waai abe ale a tuesi mi la, wa kan tuesi ka mi nyiini alege wa a tuesi ka waai dek ale tom mu la me.”

Da yeŋ ate Jɔɔn a yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Sagrɔ, tama nya ka nuru wanyi ale wa pa fi yonni nyiŋ a yiak chichiribaata nuruba zuima po a basi, ate tama a yaa weeni wa ayen wa basi, dii nyiŋ la wa daa tama po wanyi.”

Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni dan ŋman nya wa ase dila la, ni basi wa abe ni kan weeni wa ate wa basi. Nuru waai a dan pa mi yonni nyiŋ a baga a tom wakperikaliik kula nyɔnɔwa a kan ŋman baga a kpabi kaasi mi yonni.
Nuru waai ale kan ta chaab ale ti la, kula nyɔnɔwa va ti kama.
Wensie ate mi a weeni ni, nuru waai a dan nyɛ nyiam fiifiiga a te ni, ni ale ka mi ŋaaŋviiriba la nyiŋ, Naawen le tuni wa.
“Nuru waai abe dan nyɛ ate bisaŋa de wanyi a jok wa siaka, ku le zunchoŋ kama a te kula nyɔnɔwa ase ba nin pa ni kpeeni a bobi yik wa ŋiri a ta wa ga yuk basi mogi kpeeni nyiamu po ate wa kpi.

Nuru waai nisima a dan a nyɛ ayen wa jok wa siaka, kula nyɔnɔwa a gebi ni sila a basi, dii nyiŋ la, ku zunchoŋ kama ate kula nyɔnɔwa nya Naawen nyuvuri dii ale kan a kpeglim la ale ni yeŋ a gaam wa nin ta nisima siye ale ge cheŋ ninam jigi, juijui ate bolim boro a kan maara kpi la.
Nanzue ŋaai ale bo dula a de ba la a kan maari a kpi. Bolim buui me ale bo dula a de la a kan maari a kpimsi.

Nuru waai naŋ a dan a nyɛ ayen wa jok wa siaka, kula nyɔnɔwa a gebi naŋ kala a basi, dii nyiŋ la, ku zunchoŋ kama ate kula nyɔnɔwa nya nyuvuri dila ale naŋ yeŋ a gaam wa nin ta naŋsa siye ale ge cheŋ ninam jigi.
Nanzue ŋaai ale bo dula a de ba la a kan maari a kpi. Bolim buui me ale bo dula a de la a kan maari a kpimsi.

Nuru waai me num a dan a nyɛ ayen wa jok wa siaka, kula nyɔnɔwa a yeeri num bula a basi, dii nyiŋ la, ku zunchoŋ kama ate kula nyɔnɔwa jo Naawen Naamu po ale num bunyi a gaam wa nin ta nina ŋaye ale ge cheŋ ninam jigi.
Nanzue ŋaai ale bo dula a de ba la a kan maari a kpi. Bolim buui me ale bo dula a de la a kan maari a kpimsi.
“Ase dila po dila po ate ba jam pa yesa a nyo ŋanta baai ate ba pa a kaab Naawen, ayen ŋantaŋa chim ŋan welensa la, ku be le nyɛ ka dila ate waai meena a va bolim po a nyini abe wa ge nya welensa.

Yesa a masa kama. Yesaŋa masimu a dan jam nueri, ni le nyɛ ka se a ŋman te si masimma? Ase yesa ale a te jenta masim dii la, ku a fe kama ate nama dek meena a ta nyɛ magsika ale chaab ate ni boro ale masim.”

Yeezu a yaa basi dula jigini ale ge va Judia tɛŋka po a taam paari Jodan benni kauk kuŋkula. Nuru bɔari yegayega a yaa tigsi chaab a jam wa jigi ate wa yaa sak ba ase wa nyiem ale poom a sak ba dii la.
Farisiima ba gela a yaa jam wa jigi ayen ba choa wa noai a nya. Ba yaa bek wa ayen, “Ti Sinsaŋŋa a siak ayen nuru a basi wa powa?”
Yeezu a yaa bek ba ayen, “Moosis a sak ni ka se?”
Ba yaa tulisi wa ayen, “Wa sak ti kama ayen nuru waai a dan a yaali ayen wa basi wa pɔk, ku a fe ate wa ŋmarisi gbaŋ a te nipowa ate ku a sak waai meena ayen wa basi wa kama.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Moosis a sak ni kama, ayen ni a va siuk kula dii nyiŋ la, ni tue kan wom.

Alege ba ŋmarisi Naawen gbaŋka po ayen, ku piilimka po ate Naawen a nyɛ tɛŋka meena la, ‘Wa nyɛ ŋanta meena ka jaab duok ale jaab sari, nidɔa ale nipɔk,’ a yaa weeni ayen, ‘Ku ka wamaŋ ate nidɔa a basi wa ko ale wa ma, ale ge a ga faari nipɔk ate bala bayewa a chim bunyi, ba noa bayewa a ŋman daa nuruba baye, ba ka bunyi.’
Dila nyiŋ la, baai ate Naawen a basi ba ate ba chim bunyi la, nuru kan poori ba.”
Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa ŋman ga jo yeri po ate ba bek wa dii ate wa poom weeni ba la kiri.
Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nuru waai a dan basi wa pɔk ale ge a ŋman faari wa choa, wa nyɛ wa powa a kaasi kama. Wa nyɛ ka kaboŋ.
Nipɔk waai me a dan basi wa chora ale ge a ga yali nidɔa wa chora, wa me a nyɛ wa chorowa a kaasi kama. Wa nyɛ ka kaboŋ.”
Dula jigini nuruba gela a yaa pa bisa a ta ba jam Yeezu jigi ayen wa te ba niaka. Ba ale nyɛ dila la, wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa tɔariŋ ba.

Yeezu ale ga nya dii ate ba nyɛ la, wa sui a yaa jam a puuri nna yegayega ale wa ŋaaŋviirima ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni te bisaŋa siuk ate ba jam mi jigi. Ni kan yiak ba, dii nyiŋ la bala chaab ale ba jo Naawen Naamu po.
Wensie ate mi a weeni ni, ayen nuru waai ale kan pa wa dek a chim biik ayen wa nya Naawen Naamu la, wala choa kan tabi naŋ bu po.”
Yeezu a yaa pa bisaŋa wanyi wanyi a nyo wa nigoruk po a yaa pa wa nisaŋa a ji ba zuima a niak ba.
Yeezu ale basi dula jigini ale a cheŋ la, nuru wanyi a yaa chali jam tu wa a kpi duna tɛŋ wa niŋ a bek wa ayen, “Sagrɔ maŋŋa, mi le nyɛ ka se ate m nya nyuvuri dii ale kan ta kpeglimka la?”
Yeezu a yaa bek wa ayen, “Ka boa ate fi a wi mu ayen nuru maŋŋa? Nuru waai karo a chim nuru maŋ ase ka Naawen dek nyiini.
Fi poom seba Moosis Sinsaŋŋa kama, yaa boa? Naawen a weeni ayen kan ko nuru, kan nyɛ kaboŋsa, kan zu, kan chim seero waai ale a velim la, kan a yaali degaamka. Ku a fe ate fi zuli fi ko ale fi ma.”
Nuruwa yaa weeni wa ayen, “Sagrɔ, mi kasim va Sinsaŋŋa de meena kama a ta nyini m biik po a jam paari jinla.”

Yeezu yaa nya wa ate wa jiirim dari wa ate wa weeni wa ayen, “Wa yeŋ dekki ale tali fi jigi. Cheŋ a ga pa fi ŋantaŋa meena a da a tuesi ligraŋa a te niwomma. Fi dan nyɛ dila ale ge jam va mi, fi le jigsi wenŋmazuk.”
Yeezu ale weeni wa dila la wa sui yaa deri kaasi ate wa yaa deri cheŋ ale sukaasuŋ dii nyiŋ la wa jam ka ŋanta nyɔnɔ a kan siak wa ŋantaŋa nyiŋŋa.
Yeezu yaa gisi nya wa ŋaaŋviirima meena ale weeni ba ayen, “Ku tua kama ate ŋanta nyam a baga a jo Naawen naamu po.”
Wa ale weeni dila la ku yaa cha ba. Wa yaa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “M bisa, ku sum tua kama ate saalo a baga jo Naawen naamu po.
Ku ka moali ate laalaakomi a va garupein num po a nyini, a gaam jigsiro a nin wa jo Naawen naamu po.”
Yeezu ale weeni ba dila la, ku yaa cha ba. Ba yaa weeni chaab ayen, “Ku be dan ka dila, ka wana le wa baga nya varibasika?”
Yeezu a yaa nya ba a weeni ayen, “Ku tua kama nurubiik jigi, alege ku ka moali Naawen jigi, dii nyiŋ la Naawen baga wie meena a nyɛ kama.”
Dula jigini Piita a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Nya, tama basi ka ti ŋanta meena ale jam va fu.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “Wensie ate mi a weeni ni, nuru waai ale basi wa yeri ale wa ko ale wa ma ale wa suaata ale wa tɔaba ale wa bisa ale wa kadugsa, mi ale Naawen wamaŋsaŋa nyiŋ la,

wa le nya ŋanta ale nuruba nna yegayega jinla a gaam baai meena ate wa basi la. Wa le ŋman nya yie, ale maba ale suaata, ale tɔaba, ale bisa ale kadugsa, alege wa le nya ninam me nna yegayega abe chum diipo wa yaa nya nyuvuri dii ale kan ta kpeglimka la.
Baai ale de niŋ la yega ale jam wari ŋaaŋ ate baai ale wari ŋaaŋ la jam de niŋ.”

Ba ale jam bo siuku po a cheŋ Jerusalem tɛŋka la, Yeezu a yaa de ba niŋ ate ba a cheŋ. Baai meena ale jam va wa la, a jam a chali ka yɔgsum. Wa yaa poori wa ŋaaŋviirima pi ale bayewa a weeni ba dii ate nuruba ayen ba nyɛ wa la.

Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni wom nalimnyiini. Ti dan paari Jerusalem, nuruba le jam yik Mi Saalobiika, a ta mu cheŋ a ga nyo Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma nisima po. Ba le bo m kum buusa abe ba ta mu a ga nyo baai ale kan daa Juuba la nisima po.
Ba le la mu abe ba chesi tintueta a basi m nyiŋ, a nak mu abe ba yaa ko mu. Daa ŋata a dan paari mi le yiri kum po.”
Dula jigini Zebedi bisaŋa Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn, a yaa jam Yeezu jigi a weeni wa ayen, “Ti Sagrɔ, ti a yaali ayen ti saalim fu kama ate fi nyɛ wari a te ti.”
Wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boa ate nama a yaali ayen mi nyɛ a te ni?”
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Fi dan jam chim naab a soa nuru meena zuk a nya, ti a yaali kama ayen fi basi ate ti wanyi a kali fi juga, wanyi me a kali fi gala.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen “Nama ze dii ate ni a bek la. Ninam buui ate mi ayen m nam la, nama le baga a maa nam bu?”
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Ti le baga a maa nam.”
Yeezu a yaa ŋman weeni ba ayen, “Wensie, ninam buui ate mi ayen m nam la, nama me le baga a nam kama.
Alege mi ka siuk a lueri baai a le ba kali mi juga ale mi gala la. Ka Naawen le wa pa dula a te baai ate wa gomsi magsi ba la.”
Wa ŋaaŋviirima mbala piwa ale wom Jeemsi ale Jɔɔn ale bek Yeezu dii la, ba sue a yaa puuri nna yegayega ale ba.
Yeezu yaa wi ba ate ba jam tigsi chaab wa jigi ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Tɛŋzuk de nalima ta pagrim ba nuruma zuk kama a nyɛ ba ale a yaali dii la. Ba kpaŋŋa me ta pagrim ba zuk kama.
Alege ku an magsi ayen ku chim dila nama jigiya. Nuru waai a dan a yaali ayen wa chim nama kpagi, ku a fe ate wa chim ni meena tomteerɔ.
Nuru waai a dan a yaali ayen wa chim nama kpagi, ku a fe ate wa chim nama meena yomo.
Mi Saalobiika, an jam ayen m gisi ka nuruba ate ba a tom a te mu. M jam ayen m tom a te ka tɛŋzuk demma meena. M dan nyɛ dila, m le zaani nuruba yegayega naŋkula po a kpi a te ba a vari ba a basi.”

Ba yaa jam paari tɛŋ kanyi ate ba a wi ayen Jeriko, ate nuruba yegayega a yaa tigsi chaab a jam Yeezu jigi. Ba le jam a basi dula jigini ale a nyini la, ba yaa nya yio wanyi ale wa kala siuku noai a juisi. Wa yoi jam ale Baatimiusi. Ku kiri ale Timiusi biik.
Wa ale wom ayen ka Yeezu Nazaret denowa ale a taam la, wa yaa kaari a wi wa ayen, “Yeezu, fi waai ale ka naawa Deevid ŋaaŋbiik la, ta jiirim ale mu abe fi maari mu.”

Nuruma yega a yaa weeni wa ayen wa goori wa wanni, alege wa zɛri ale a kaari nna yegayega, a gaam wa ale poom a kaari dii la a ŋman weeni wa ayen, “Yeezu, fi waai ale ka naawa Deevid ŋaaŋbiik la, ta jiirim ale mu abe fi maari mu.”
Yeezu a yaa zaani a weeni ba ayen ba wi wa ate wa yiri a jam wa jigi.
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Te fi sui peenti abe fi yiri jam, dii nyiŋ la wa a wi fu kama.”
Yiowa a yaa yeeri wa kasaauku a dueni, ale yiri a zaani ŋmai a cheŋ ga Yeezu jigi.
Yeezu a yaa bek wa ayen, “Fi a yaali ayen mi nyɛ ka boa a te fu?”
Wa yaa weeni wa ayen, “Sagrɔ, mi a yaali ayen fi nyɛ kama ate m ninaŋa a lagri a te mu.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Be cheŋ. Fi ale ta siaka ale mu dii la a basi kama ate fi ninaŋa a lagri.”
Wa ninaŋa yaa deri lagri ate wa yaa va Yeezu a cheŋ.

Ba yaa jam paari tɛŋfiik sii ate ba a wi ayen Betfaaji ale Betani ale guuk kuui ate ba a wi ayen Olivi guuk la. Tɛŋsaŋa ale guuku a jam mɔata ka Jerusalem tɛŋka. Yeezu a yaa wi wa ŋaaŋviirima po baye a weeni ba ayen,
“Ni cheŋ a ga jo tɛŋfiik kaai ale bo ni niŋ la. Ni dan deri ga jo dula, ni le nya bompaalik ate ba bobi ka zaani. Nuru an diem a do ka nyaya. Ni foli ka a ta jam te mu.
Ni dan boro a foli ka, ate nuru bek ni dii nyiŋ ate ni a foli ka la, ni weeni wa ayen ka Nyɔnɔwa ale a yaali ka. Wa be dan nueri ale ka wa le ŋman basi ate ba ta ka a jam nwuli.”
Ba yaa cheŋ a ga nya bompaalik ale ka bobi za yeri nansiuŋ noai ate ba yaa foli ka.
Nuru baai ale jam za dula jigini la, a yaa nya ba a bek ayen, “Ka boa ale soa ate nama a foli ka?”
Ba yaa weeni ba dii ate Yeezu a poom weeni ba la, ate nuruma a yaa basi ate ba foli ka a ta cheŋ ga te wa.
Ba yaa ta bompaalika a ga te Yeezu, a yaa yeeri ba gattaŋa a pa vi bompaalika chiaka zuk ate Yeezu a yaa jueli a kali.
Nuruba yegayega a yaa jam pa ba gattaŋa a pati siuku niŋ ayen Yeezu a ta wa bonika a cheŋ va ti zuk a taam. Ba gela me a cheŋ siuku nakpiak a ga che tiisa vaata a ta jam pati siuku niŋ.
Ba ale jam bo siuku po a cheŋ la baai ale jam de niŋka la, ale baai me ale jam bo ŋaaŋka la, meena a yaa zuli wa a kaari ayen,
“Naawen vari ti a basi.
Naawen niak waai ale cheena Nyɔnɔwa yonni nyiŋ la.
Naawen niak waai ale cheena ayen wa soa ti kokpieŋka Deevid naam buui ale cheena la.
Fi, Naawen waai ale bo wenŋmazuk la, a vari ti a basi.”

Yeezu ale jam paari Jerusalem tɛŋka la, wa yaa cheŋ ga jo Juuma Puusika Yenni po a nyiem a nya jaab buuri meena ale bo di po la a yaa ale ge a ŋman nyini. Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima an jam bo dula jigini a beniya, dii nyiŋ la, wenni a jam a siŋ kama. Ba yaa basi dula jigini ale ŋman cheŋ Betani.
Vari ale jam veenti la, ba yaa ŋman yiri a basi Betani ale nyini. Kom a yaa jam ta Yeezu.

Wa yaa nya kiŋkaŋ a za niŋniŋ ate vaata a lik ka. Wa yaa cheŋ ga paari ka tɛŋ ayen wa nya ase ka ta moota ya ate wa de, alege moota a jam ka ka zuwa. Ka jam ta ka vaata nyiini, dii nyiŋ la ku jam daa moota wenya.
Yeezu a yaa ka te kiŋkaŋka ayen, “A nyini jinla danni a ta a cheŋ diipo meena wuu, nuru a kan ŋman nya fi moota a de.”
Wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa wom dii ate wa weeni la.

Ba ale ŋman jam paari Jerusalem tɛŋka la, Yeezu a yaa ŋman ga jo Juuma Puusika Yenni po. Nuruba ale jam bo di po a gerimu ale chaab. Wa yaa yiak ba meena ate ba nyini dula jigini a nyini, a zak nuru baai ale jam ta ligraŋa a tagri la teebulitaŋa a tulim kpib, a tusi baai ale ta nangbaŋsaŋa a da la zukpaglisaŋa me a lonsi.
Wa an jam siak ayen waai a ŋman ta jaab a va Juuma Puusika Yenni po a taam nyini.
Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ wa yaa ŋman sak nuruma ale bek ba ayen, “Nama ze dii ate ba ŋmarisi Naawen gbaŋka po dila po dila po la? Ba ŋmarisi ayen Naawen a weeni ayen,
‘Mi yenni ka tɛŋsa meena Puusika Yeri.’
Ba ŋmarisi nyaku de kama alege nama a pa di chim zueba sukka jigi.”

Yeezu ale ga weeni dila ate Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma a ga wom la, ba yaa jam a gisi siuk ayen ba ko wa. Alege yɔgsum ale jam yik ba ale Yeezu ate ba an jam baga a nya siuk a tiri wa. Dii nyiŋ la wa sinsaŋŋa a jam cha nuruma kama.
Junɔai ale jam paari la, Yeezu ale wa ŋaaŋviirima a yaa basi Jerusalem tɛŋka ale nyini a cheŋ.
Vari ale ŋman veenti la, ba yaa va siuku a taam a yaa nya kiŋkaŋka ale ka kpi za.
Piita a yaa teeri Yeezu diem ale weeni dii la, a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Nya, kiŋkaŋ kaai ate fi diem a ka te ka la, ka meena a kpi kama.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni ta siaka ale Naawen.

Wensie ate mi a weeni ni, waai ale ta siaka ale Naawen ale ka chichama ale sum siak ayen wa ale weeni dii la le nyɛ la, a baga a weeni gu kpioŋku kama ayen ku voori dula jigini a ga lo mogi kpeeni po ate Naawen sum nyɛ a te wa.
Dila nyiŋ ni dan puusi a te Naawen a juisi jaab, ni ta siaka ayen ni nya jaamu kama ate Naawen yaa pa a te ni.
Diipo meena ni daa ni puusi a te Naawen ni de niŋ a voŋ te baai ale nyɛ ni a kaasi la, abe ni ge a puusi a te Naawen waai ale bo wenŋmazuk la ate wa me a voŋ te ni.
Ni dan kan nyɛ dila, Naawen abe kan voŋ te nama me.”

Ba yaa ŋman jam Jerusalem tɛŋka po a ga jo Juuma Puusika Yenni po. Yeezu ale bo di po a nyiem la, Juuma Puusika Yenni kpaŋŋa ale Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma ale tɛŋka kpaŋŋa meena a yaa tigsi chaab a jam wa jigi
a yaa bek wa ayen, “Ka boan pagrim ate fi ta a tom wieŋa de? Ka wana ale te fu siuk ate fi a nyiem a tom wieŋa de?”
Yeezu yaa weeni ba ayen, “Mi me le bek ni wari. M dan bek ni ate ni siak a tulisi mu, mi me le weeni sak ni pagrim buui ate mi ta tom wieŋa de la.”
Yeezu a yaa bek ba ayen, “Jɔɔn ale jam a te nuruba soka la, ka Naawen ale jam te wa pagrimu yaa ka nurubiiga?”
Wa le bek ba dila la, ba yaa ta nampaga ale chaab ayen, “Ti dan weeni wa ayen ka Naawen ale te wa pagrimu, wa le bek ti ayen, ‘Be ka boa ale soa ate ti an siak a te wa?’
Ti be an baga a weeni me ayen ka nurubiik ale te wa pagrimu dii nyiŋ la, waai meena a seba wa ale jam ka Naawen biisiteerɔ la kama.” (Ate ba yaa chali yɔgsum).
Ba yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Tama ze.”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Mi me a kan weeni ni pagrim buui ate mi ta a tom wieŋa de la.”

Yeezu yaa magsi wamagsima a sak ba ayen, “Nuru wanyi ale jam boro a yaa kpa wa talim fiik, a vuk ti fiisa bu po ayen si a yoani. Wa yaa che daata a ti gilim bu meena ale ge gomsi jaab meena bu po a magsi. Wa ale nyɛ dila a ga nueri la, wa yaa yaali nuruba ayen ba a limsi bu abe ba a tom bu po ale ge nyiem a cheŋ tɛŋ m na niŋniŋa.
Wa talimu tiisaŋa yoanaŋa gbesika ale jam paari la, wa yaa tom wa tomteerɔma po wanyi ayen wa ga tuesi wa deka jigini a ta jam te wa.
Wa ale ga paari dula la, nuruma a yaa yik wa a nak ale mini wa yoanaŋa ate wa pilim kuli niyaala.
Talimu nyɔnɔwa yaa ŋman tom tomteerɔ wa choa ba jigi ate ba ŋman yik wa me a nak wa zukku, a pa wa a nyo chivie po.
Wa yaa ŋman pilim tom wa choa ba jigi ate ba ko wala. Ba jam a nyɛ ka nuruba yega dila; a nak ba gela ale a ko ba gela me.
Waai nyiini ale jam tali ayen wa tom la ale wa dek biika, waai ate wa mariŋ la. Wa yaa weeni wa dek ayen, ‘M dan tom m dek biika, ba le te wa zula.’ Wa yaa tom wa ate wa cheŋ ba jigi.

Alege nuruma ale nya wa biika la, ba yaa weeni chaab ayen, ‘Biika kowa a dan kpi, wala le wa soa wa ŋantaŋa meena. Dila nyiŋ ni basi ate ti ko wa ate wa kowa chum dan kan boro abe tama soa wa ŋantaŋa.’
Ba yaa yik wa a ko a vuuri wa a ta nyini talimu po a nyini peelim.
“Nama seba talimu nyɔnɔwa le wa nyɛ ba dii la? Wa le jam ko ba kama abe wa ŋman pa wa talimu a te nuru yonta.”
Yeezu ale magsi wamagsini a nueri la, wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Nama an diem a karim nyaku de Naawen gbaŋka po?
‘Tain dii ate seeroma a zɛri ayen di an nala la,
tain dila dek ale tulim a chim tain maŋ.
Naawen ale nyɛ dila. Di ka wakperik ti jigi.’ ”

Yeezu ale weeni wieŋa de meena a ga nueri la, Juuma kpaŋŋa yaa deri miŋ ayen ka ba jigi ate wa pa wamagsini de a magsi dii nyiŋ la, ba zɛri wa kama. Ba yaa jam a yaali ayen ba yik wa, alege ba jam a chali nuru bɔanni yɔgsum, ate ba yaa jam basi wa ale ge cheŋ.
Dula jigini Juuma kpaŋŋa a yaa tom Farisiima gela ale naawa Ayerod nuruma gela ayen ba ga choa Yeezu noai a wom.

Ba yaa jam weeni wa ayen, “Sagrɔ, ti seba ayen fi ka wensie nyɔnɔ. Fi niŋ ka dii meena ate nuruba a poli la po. Nuruba kpaŋta kan basi ate fi a tagri fi popola. Fi a sak Naawen wieŋa kama ale wensie. Ku magsi ayen ti tuni ti lampoowa a te nakpioŋku Siiza, yaa ku an magsi ya? Ti a tuni yaa ti kan a tuni?”
Yeezu a poom seba ba kiri kama ate wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boa ate ni a yaali ayen ni choa m noai a wom? Ni ga ta ligbiri a jam te mu.”
Ba yaa ta ligbiri dinyi a jam te wa. Wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka wana zuk ale wa yoi ale dua ligni nyiŋŋa?”
Ba yaa weeni wa ayen, “Ka nakpioŋku Siiza zuk ale wa yoi ale dua du.”
Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Dan ka dila, ni be pa ŋanta baai ate Siiza a soa la a te wa, abe ni pa ŋanta baai me ate Naawen a soa la a te Naawen.”
Ba ale wom dila la, ku yaa cha ba.
Dula jigini nuru baai ate ba a wi ayen Sajusiba la, ba gela a yaa jam Yeezu jigi. Ba jam a poli kama ayen nuruba dan kpi, ba an ŋman baga a yiri kum po.

Ba yaa weeni Yeezu ayen, “Moosis a ŋmarisi wa gbaŋka po kama ayen, ‘Nuru waai a dan faari nipɔk ate wa ale wa an biak a nyaya ale ge ate wa kpi, ti a basi kama ate wa yuawa a faari nipowa a biak bisa a te wa ate wa yonni a kan be.’
Nuruba bayopoi ale jam boro a chim suaata ate ba suok kpagini a faari nipɔk ate ba an biaya ale ge ate wa kpi.
Waai ale pa saŋ la a yaa faari wa suoku powa, alege nipowa ale wa me an biak a nyaya ale ge ate wa me a kpi. Ba suok kuui ale pa saŋ butawa la me a nyɛ dila degadega.
Ba meena bayopoiwa a jam faari nipowa kama a taam tu, alege ba waai an biak ale wa ale ge kpi ya. Ku ŋaaŋnyiŋ ate nipowa me a yaa kpi.
Yɔgyɔgla de ate nuruba bayopoiwa de meena a faari wa a nya la, dai dii dai ate nuruba meena ayen ba yiri kum po la, ka ba wana dek chekki ale wa soa nipowa de?”
Yeezu yaa weeni ba ayen, “Nama an diem a miŋ Naawen gbaŋka po wieŋa chagiya. Ka dila ale soa ate ni be siuku. Ni ze Naawen pagrimu me ale ka dii la.
Dai dii dai ate nuruba meena ayen ba yiri kum po la, ba meena le tagri kama a nyɛ ase Naawen sabiiloma, baai ale bo wenŋmazuk la. Nidɔa a kan ŋman faari nipowa. Nipɔk me abe kan ŋman yali chora.

Yɔgyɔgla de, a magsi chaab ale nuruba le ba yiri kum po la, nama an karim Moosis gbaŋka kauk kuui ale a biisi a magsi chaab ale ti fiika ate bolimu jam a nyɛ nna ase bu a de bu la? Dula jigini ku ŋmarisi kama ayen Naawen weeni Moosis kama ayen, ‘Wa ale Abraham ale Aizik ale Jekob Naawenni.’
Dila a sak kama ayen wa daa kpilima Naawenya, wa ka ŋanvuuta Naawen, dila nyiŋ ni be siuku kama.”

Yeezu ale Sajusima ale boro a biisi la, Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma wanyi a yaa wom ba ale a biisi dii la. Wa ale wom ale Yeezu a tulisi ba magsi la, wa yaa jam bek Yeezu ayen, “Ka Naawen Sinsaŋŋa po ŋa ŋan dek ale chim sinsak kpeema a gaam ŋa meena?”
Yeezu a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Sinsaŋŋa de ale chim sinsak kpeema a gaam ŋa meena. ‘Izirali demma ni wom nalimnyiini. Tama Nyɔnɔwa Naawen ka dinyi dekki.
A yaali wa ale fi sunum ale fi chiik ale fi popola ale fi pagrim meena.’
Sinsak kpeema ŋaai ale pa a saŋ la ale nna, ‘A yaali fi saalo choa ase fi dek la.’ Sinsaŋŋa ŋman karo a chim sinsak kpeema a gaam sinsaŋŋa de ŋayewa.”
Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔwa a yaa weeni wa ayen, “Sagrɔ, fi wieŋa ka wensie. Naawen sum ka dinyi dekki. Naawen di choa a ŋman karo a gum wa po.
Fi dan yaali wa ale fi sunum ale fi popola ale fi pagrim meena ale yaali fi saalo choa me ase fi dek la, dila ka wari kpeeni a gaam fi ale a ko duŋsa ale pa ŋanta ba chaab a kaab a te wa la kama.”
Nuruwa ale weeni dila la, Yeezu yaa seba ayen wa tulisi wa ka nalimnyiini ate wa yaa weeni wa ayen, “Ku tali ka magla ate fi jo Naawen naamu po.”
Yeezu ale biisi ale nuruwa a ga nueri la, waai ŋman jam karo a ta zupagruk ayen wa bek wa wariya.

Da yeŋ ate Yeezu a yaa jam boro a sak nuruma Juuma Puusika Yenni po. Wa yaa bek ba ayen, “Ka boa ale soa ate Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma a weeni ayen Kirisitawa, waai ate Naawen le tom ate wa jam la, ale chim ka naawa Deevid ŋaaŋ biiga?
Naawen Chiika jam basi kama ate Deevid weeni ayen,
‘Nyɔnɔwa Naawen weeni mi Nyɔnɔwa ayen,
kali m juga nyiŋ a ta cheena diipo ate m le basi ate fi dachaasaŋa a chim fi yom la.’
Ase Deevid dek a dan a wi Kirisitawa ayen wa, ‘Nyɔnɔ’, ku be zaani ka se ate wa ŋman baga a chim Deevid ŋaaŋbiiga?”
Nuru bɔari nna yegayega ale jam boro a wom Yeezu sinsaŋŋa ale supeentik.

Wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni kpesi ni dek ate Juuma Sinsaŋŋa sagrɔma a kan paasi ni. Ba a yaali kama ayen ba jo ba garuk woŋtaŋa a bo yabaŋa po a nyiem a cheŋ ate nuruba a puusi ba abe ba a te ba zula me.

Ba a yaali kama ayen ba nyiem a kali zukpaglik sii ate nuru kpeentaŋa a kali la zuima ba tuka diinaŋa po. Ba nyiem a dan boro a nyɛ tigi ba a yaali kama ayen ba a kali zukpaglik sii ate ba kpaŋŋa a kali la zuk.
Ba nyiem a ga a paasi ka pukoga a tuesi ba ŋanta ale ge a paasi waai meena a puusi puusa woŋta a te Naawen. Wa dan jam ayen wa bo ba buusa, ba waalika le zuak yegayega.”

Yeezu a jam kala ka Juuma Puusika Yenni po a mɔata juijui ate nuruba ta ba ligra a jam a nyoro a te Naawen la, a yaa a nya. Ligra nyam yegayega ale jam maa bo Puusika Yenni po. Ba me yaa jam maa ta ligra nna yegayega a jam a nyoro.
Pukogi niwobo a yaa jam boro a ta wa ligbie ŋaye a jam nyoro. Ŋa a magsi chaab ale ka kubook.

Yeezu yaa wi wa ŋaaŋviirima ate ba jam wa jigi ate wa yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni wom dii ate m tara ayen m weeni a sak ni la. Ni nya pukogini de. Wa ligbie ŋayewa ate wa nyoro la, Naawen jigi wa tiirimu a gaam ligra nyamma de ligraŋa kama, dii nyiŋ la, ba te ka ligra dii ale kan tua ale ba pa teka la, alege pukogini de a pa ka wa ligraŋa meena ate wa ta la a ta jam nyoro.”
Yeezu yaa ale jam nyini Juuma Puusika Yenni po a nyini la, wa ŋaaŋviirima po wanyi a yaa weeni ayen, “Sagrɔ, nya yenni ale nala dii la?”
Yeezu a yaa tulisi ayen, “Ni nya yeri kpeeni de? Dai cheena ate ba le nak di meena a lonsi. Tain yeŋ me la a kan ŋman dua di choa zuwa.”
Ba yaa cheŋ ga jueli Olivi Guuku zuk a kala dula jigini a nya Juuma Puusika Yenni. Piita ale Jɔɔn ale Jeemsi ale Andiru a yaa bek Yeezu ba dek ba nyiini ayen,
“Ka dimpo ate wieŋa de meena ayen ŋa nyɛ? Ka boa a le ku nyɛ ate ku sak ti ayen danni a mɔata?”
Yeezu a yaa weeni ba ayen, “Ni kpesi ni dek ate waai a kan paasi ni.
Nuruba yegayega le jam pa ba dek a chim Kirisitawa. Ba le paasi nuruba yegayega ayen ba va ba.
Ni dan wom kpaliŋsa wie ate si gela mɔata alege si gela me a bo niŋniŋa, ni kan a chali yɔgsumɔa. Ku a fe kama ayen nyaŋa de meena a nyɛ, alege ku kan sak kama ayen tɛŋka kpeglimka a mɔata kama.
